Steam (ST): With Jessica's death, it became certain that that the culprit was hiding somewhere nearby, and that they'd come for our lives if they had a chance.
Umineko Project (UP): With Jessica's death, it became certain that the culprit was hiding somewhere nearby, and that they would come after our lives if they had a chance.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): With Jessica's death, it became certain that that the culprit was hiding somewhere nearby, and that they would come after our lives if they had a chance.
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香の死により、犯人は身近に潜んでいて、しかも隙あらば命を狙ってくることが確実となった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 朱志香の死により、犯人は身近に潜んでいて、しかも隙あらば命を狙ってくることが確実となった。
Russian (RU): Со смертью Джессики стало очевидно, что преступник скрывался где‐то рядом, и что он попытается забрать и наши жизни, возникни у него такой шанс.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com a morte da Jessica, era certo de que o culpado estava escondido em algum lugar próximo, e ele iria vir atrás de nossas vidas assim que tivesse uma chance.
Vietnamese (VI): With Jessica's death, it became certain that the culprit was hiding somewhere nearby, and that they would come after our lives if they had a chance.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朱志香的死，將犯人還潛伏在附近，一旦找到機會就會再次殺人的這一推論，變成了確切的事實。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朱志香的死，将犯人还潜伏在附近，一旦找到机会就会再次杀人的这一推论，变成了确切的事实。
Indonesian (IDN): With Jessica's death, it became certain that the culprit was hiding somewhere nearby, and that they would come after our lives if they had a chance.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con la morte di Jessica, era diventato certo che il colpevole si stava nascondendo da qualche parte lì vicino, e che avrebbe cercato di ucciderci se ne avesse avuto la possibilità.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Con la morte di Jessica, era diventato certo che il colpevole si stesse nascondendo nei paraggi, e che se ne avesse avuto l'opportunità, avrebbe cercato di toglierci la vita.
Turkish (TR): Jessica'nın ölümüyle birlikte suçlunun yakınlarda bir yerde saklandığı ve ellerine fırsat geçerse canlarımızın peşine düşecekleri kesinleşti.

Steam (ST): According to Genji-san, when tomorrow morning comes, the boat should arrive.
Umineko Project (UP): According to Genji‐san, when tomorrow morning comes, the boat should arrive.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): According to Genji-san, when tomorrow morning comes, the boat should arrive.
PC Japanese (JP): 源次さんの話によれば、明日の朝になれば船が来てくれるはずだという。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 源次さんの話によれば、明日の朝になれば船が来てくれるはずだという。
Russian (RU): По словам Генджи‐сана, катер прибудет завтра утром.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De acordo com o Genji‐san, quando o amanhã chegar, o barco deve vir.
Vietnamese (VI): According to Genji‐san, when tomorrow morning comes, the boat should arrive.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 據源次所說，到了明天早上就應該會有船來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 据源次所说，到了明天早上就应该会有船来。
Indonesian (IDN): According to Genji‐san, when tomorrow morning comes, the boat should arrive.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Secondo Genji-san, domani mattina dovrebbe arrivare una barca.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Stando alle parole di Genji-san, la mattina seguente sarebbe dovuta arrivare un battello.
Turkish (TR): Genji-san'a göre, yarın sabah olduğunda tekne gelmiş olacak.

Steam (ST): The boat had a radio. We'd probably be able to contact the police directly with that.
Umineko Project (UP): The boat has a radio, too.{n}We'll probably be able to contact the police immediately with that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The boat had a radio. We could probably contact the police directly with that.
PC Japanese (JP): 船には無線もある。それで直ちに警察へ連絡できるだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 船には無線もある。{n}それで直ちに警察へ連絡できるだろう。
Russian (RU): На катере есть радио.{n}Вероятно, так мы сможем немедленно связаться с полицией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O barco também tem um rádio.{n}Nós provavelmente seremos capazes de entrar em contato com a polícia imediatamente.
Vietnamese (VI): The boat has a radio, too.{n}We'll probably be able to contact the police immediately with that.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 船上有無線電。{n}用它就可以直接和警察聯絡了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 船上有无线电。{n}用它就可以直接和警察联络了吧。
Indonesian (IDN): The boat has a radio, too.{n}We'll probably be able to contact the police immediately with that.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La barca ha una radio. Potremmo contattare direttamente la polizia con essa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Nei battelli ci sono anche le radio.{n}Con una di esse avremmo potuto subito contattare la polizia.
Turkish (TR): Teknenin telsizi de var.{n}Muhtemelen onun sayesinde hemen polisle irtibata geçebileceğiz.

Steam (ST): All of us gathered in the parlor and decided to wait quietly until tomorrow.
Umineko Project (UP): We all gathered in the parlor, and decided to wait quietly until tomorrow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): All of us gathered in the parlor, and decided to wait quietly until tomorrow.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺たち全員は客間に集まり、大人しく明日を待とうということになった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺たち全員は客間に集まり、大人しく明日を待とうということになった。
Russian (RU): Все мы собрались в гостиной и решили спокойно ждать завтрашнего дня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós nos reunimos na sala de visitas, e então decidimos esperar silenciosamente até amanhã.
Vietnamese (VI): We all gathered in the parlor, and decided to wait quietly until tomorrow.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們決定了所有人一同聚集在客廳，乖乖等到明天。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们决定了所有人一同聚集在客厅，乖乖等到明天。
Indonesian (IDN): We all gathered in the parlor, and decided to wait quietly until tomorrow.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tutti noi ci riunimmo nel salotto, decisi ad aspettare tranquilli fino a domani.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ci radunammo tutti nel salotto, decisi ad aspettare docilmente la venuta del giorno dopo.
Turkish (TR): Hepimiz salonda toplandık ve yarına kadar sessizce beklemeye karar verdik.

Steam (ST): I proposed that we should search throughout the mansion for clues about the culprit, but Aunt Rosa rejected that, saying that if we managed to corner the culprit, or maybe provoke them, it might lead to a third murder.
Umineko Project (UP): I proposed that we should search throughout the mansion for clues about the culprit, but Auntie Rosa rejected that, saying that if we put pressure on the culprit, or provoked them, it might lead to a third murder.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I proposed that we should search throughout the mansion for clues about the culprit, but Rosa oba-san rejected that, saying that if we managed to corner the culprit, or maybe provoke them, it might lead to a third murder.
PC Japanese (JP): 屋敷内を捜索して犯人の手掛かりを捜すべきだと俺は提案したが、それによって犯人を追い詰めたり、あるいは挑発することになれば、第三の殺人を誘発することになるかもしれないとして楼座叔母さんはそれを却下した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 屋敷内を捜索して犯人の手掛かりを捜すべきだと俺は提案したが、それによって犯人を追い詰めたり、あるいは挑発することになれば、第三の殺人を誘発することになるかもしれないとして楼座叔母さんはそれを却下した。
Russian (RU): Я предложил, что нам следует обыскать особняк в поисках информации о преступнике, но тётя Роза отказала, объясняя, что если нам удастся припереть преступника к стенке или, возможно, спровоцировать его, это может привести к третьему убийству.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu propus que nós deveríamos procurar pistas sobre o culpado pela mansão, mas a tia Rosa rejeitou a ideia, dizendo que se formos atrás do culpado, ou provocarmos ele, isso poderia levar a um terceiro assassinato.
Vietnamese (VI): I proposed that we should search throughout the mansion for clues about the culprit, but Auntie Rosa rejected that, saying that if we put pressure on the culprit, or provoked them, it might lead to a third murder.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然我提議應該去搜索下大屋，找找犯人的線索，但是樓座姑母說，這麼做若是把犯人逼急，又或者是挑釁到犯人的話，就可能會誘發第三起殺人事件，因而將此否決了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然我提议应该去搜索下大屋，找找犯人的线索，但是楼座姑母说，这么做若是把犯人逼急，又或者是挑衅到犯人的话，就可能会诱发第三起杀人事件，因而将此否决了。
Indonesian (IDN): I proposed that we should search throughout the mansion for clues about the culprit, but Auntie Rosa rejected that, saying that if we put pressure on the culprit, or provoked them, it might lead to a third murder.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dissi che avremmo dovuto cercare indizi sul colpevole nella villa, ma Rosa oba-san rifiutò, dicendo che se fossimo riusciti a mettere con le spalle al muro il colpevole, o provocarlo, ciò avrebbe potuto portare ad un terzo omicidio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Io avanzai la proposta di perlustrare la villa e di cercare indizi sul colpevole, ma zia Rosa la rigettò, dicendo che se avessimo messo il colpevole con le spalle al muro, oppure si fosse sentito sfidato, ciò avrebbe potuto scatenare un terzo omicidio...
Turkish (TR): Suçlu hakkında ipucu bulmak için malikanenin her tarafını araştırmamızı önerdim, ancak Rosa Teyze bunu reddetti ve suçluya baskı yaparsak ya da onu kışkırtırsak, üçüncü bir cinayete yol açabileceğimizi söyledi.

Steam (ST): ...That was probably the right thing to do. If a bunch of amateurs like us investigated, there's no way we'd find anything.
Umineko Project (UP): ...That was probably the right thing to do.{n}Even if a bunch of amateurs like us investigated, there's no way we'd find anything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...That was probably the right thing to do. If a bunch of amateurs like us investigated, there's no way we'd find anything.
PC Japanese (JP): …恐らく、それは正しいだろう。自分たち素人が何を捜査したって、何も掴めるわけがない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …恐らく、それは正しいだろう。{n}自分たち素人が何を捜査したって、何も掴めるわけがない。
Russian (RU): ...Вероятно, это было верно.{n}Если кучка дилетантов вроде нас будет вести расследование, то это ни к чему не приведет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Aquela provavelmente era a coisa certa a se fazer.{n}Mesmo se um bando de amadores como nós investigarmos, não tem como acharmos nada.
Vietnamese (VI): ...That was probably the right thing to do.{n}Even if a bunch of amateurs like us investigated, there's no way we'd find anything.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …或許，正是應該這麼做吧。{n}我們外行人不論怎麼搜查，都不可能找得到有用的證據。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …或许，正是应该这么做吧。{n}我们外行人不论怎么搜查，都不可能找得到有用的证据。
Indonesian (IDN): ...That was probably the right thing to do.{n}Even if a bunch of amateurs like us investigated, there's no way we'd find anything.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Probabilmente era la cosa giusta da fare. Se un gruppetto di inesperti come noi avesse investigato, non avrebbe di sicuro trovato niente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Probabilmente era la cosa giusta da fare.{n}Era impossibile che dei dilettanti come noi avrebbero ottenuto qualcosa indagando.
Turkish (TR): ...Yapılacak en doğru şey muhtemelen buydu.{n}Bizim gibi bir grup amatör araştırsa bile, bir şey bulmamızın imkanı yok.

Steam (ST): It would be wisest to focus on protecting ourselves without doing anything unnecessary and leave it to the police starting tomorrow.
Umineko Project (UP): It would be wisest to focus on protecting ourselves without doing anything unnecessary, and leave it to the police after tomorrow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It would be wisest to focus on protecting ourselves without doing anything unnecessary, and leave it to the police after tomorrow.
PC Japanese (JP): 余計なことをせず、身の安全を守ることに専念し、明日以降、警察に委ねるのがもっとも賢いことだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 余計なことをせず、身の安全を守ることに専念し、明日以降、警察に委ねるのがもっとも賢いことだった。
Russian (RU): Наиболее разумно сосредоточиться на самозащите, не делая ничего ненужного, и оставить это полиции на послезавтра.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seria mais sábio focar em nos protegermos do que fazer qualquer coisa desnecessária, e deixar isso com a polícia depois de amanhã.
Vietnamese (VI): It would be wisest to focus on protecting ourselves without doing anything unnecessary, and leave it to the police after tomorrow.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不去做多餘的事，而是專心保護自身的安全，等到明天後將一切托付給警察，乃是最為明智之舉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不去做多余的事，而是专心保护自身的安全，等到明天后将一切托付给警察，乃是最为明智之举。
Indonesian (IDN): It would be wisest to focus on protecting ourselves without doing anything unnecessary, and leave it to the police after tomorrow.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sarebbe più saggio concentrarsi sulla nostra protezione, senza fare niente di inutile, e lasciare il compito alla polizia domani.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Sarebbe stato più saggio concentrarsi sulla nostra incolumità senza compiere gesti inutili, e lasciare tutto alla polizia il giorno seguente.
Turkish (TR): Gereksiz bir şey yapmadan kendimizi korumaya odaklanmak ve yarından sonra işi polise bırakmak akıllıca olacaktır.

Steam (ST): We'd been tense at the beginning, but other than Aunt Rosa, most of us had spent all morning watching TV and getting bored, so our sense of danger had faded considerably.
Umineko Project (UP): We had been tense in the beginning, but other than Auntie Rosa, most of us had spent all morning watching TV and were getting bored, so our sense of danger had grown much less intense.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We had been tense in the beginning, but other than Rosa oba-san, most of the people had spent all afternoon watching TV and were getting bored, so our sense of danger had grown much less intense.
PC Japanese (JP): 最初の内はぴりぴりしていたが、楼座叔母さんを除き、ほとんどの者は午前中いっぱいをテレビを見て過ごしている内にだんだん退屈になり、危機感がだいぶ薄れてしまうのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 最初の内はぴりぴりしていたが、楼座叔母さんを除き、ほとんどの者は午前中いっぱいをテレビを見て過ごしている内にだんだん退屈になり、危機感がだいぶ薄れてしまうのだった。
Russian (RU): Сначала мы были напряжены, но, кроме тёти Розы, большинство провело весь день смотря телевизор и соскучились, поэтому наше чувство опасности заметно утихло.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós estamos nessa tensão desde o começo. Mas, à exceção da tia Rosa, a maioria de nós passou o dia assistindo TV e ficando entediado, então nosso senso de perigo não se desenvolveu tanto.
Vietnamese (VI): We had been tense in the beginning, but other than Auntie Rosa, most of us had spent all morning watching TV and were getting bored, so our sense of danger had grown much less intense.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說最開始時大家都戰戰兢兢的，但到了現在，除去樓座姑母，基本所有人都看了一上午電視，漸漸覺得無聊，大大減輕了危機感。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说最开始时大家都战战兢兢的，但到了现在，除去楼座姑母，基本所有人都看了一上午电视，渐渐觉得无聊，大大减轻了危机感。
Indonesian (IDN): We had been tense in the beginning, but other than Auntie Rosa, most of us had spent all morning watching TV and were getting bored, so our sense of danger had grown much less intense.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): All'inizio eravamo tutti tesi, ma oltre a Rosa oba-san, la maggior parte di noi aveva trascorso tutto il pomeriggio a guardare la tv e si stava cominciando ad annoiare, quindi il nostro senso del pericolo era diventato sempre meno intenso.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Inizialmente eravamo tutti tesi, ma ad esclusione di zia Rosa, la maggior parte di noi si era gradualmente annoiata a forza di trascorrere l'intera mattinata a guardare la TV, e la nostra percezione del pericolo si attenuò considerevolmente.
Turkish (TR): Başlangıçta gergindik ama Rosa Teyze dışında çoğumuz bütün sabahı televizyon izleyerek geçirmiş ve sıkılmıştık, bu yüzden tehlike algımız giderek azalmıştı.

Steam (ST): When we thought about it...yes, six adults certainly had been killed together in the first murder, but that made it seem like some back-handed method like poison had been used.
Umineko Project (UP): When we thought about it, even though there certainly had been six adults killed at once in the first murder, that made us imagine that some back‐handed method like poison had been used.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When we thought about it, even though there certainly had been six adults killed at once in the first murder, that made us imagine that some back-handed method like poison had been used.
PC Japanese (JP): 考えてみれば、第一の殺人は確かに６人もの大人が一度に殺されているが、それゆえに毒殺などの搦め手による殺人を想像させた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 考えてみれば、第一の殺人は確かに６人もの大人が一度に殺されているが、それゆえに毒殺などの搦め手による殺人を想像させた。
Russian (RU): Когда мы поразмыслили над сложившейся ситуацией и о том, что шестеро взрослых определённо были убиты вместе в первом убийстве, у нас сложилось впечатление, что использовался некий обманный метод, вроде яда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando pensamos sobre isso, mesmo sendo certo que seis adultos haviam sido mortos no primeiro assassinato, aquilo nos fez imaginar que algum método como veneno tinha sido utilizado.
Vietnamese (VI): When we thought about it, even though there certainly had been six adults killed at once in the first murder, that made us imagine that some back‐handed method like poison had been used.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 仔細一想，雖說在第一起殺人事件中，確實是一次性殺死了六位大人，但由此也讓我們聯想到了，這可能一起是用下毒之類的陰招完成的殺人案。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 仔细一想，虽说在第一起杀人事件中，确实是一次性杀死了六位大人，但由此也让我们联想到了，这可能一起是用下毒之类的阴招完成的杀人案。
Indonesian (IDN): When we thought about it, even though there certainly had been six adults killed at once in the first murder, that made us imagine that some back‐handed method like poison had been used.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando ci pensammo, nonostante fosse certo che sei adulti erano stati uccisi nel primo omicidio, ciò ci fece immaginare che era stato usato qualche metodo subdolo come del veleno.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando ci riflettemmo... era vero che nel primo omicidio erano stati uccisi in una volta sola sei adulti, ma ciò ci fece suppore che fosse stato usato qualche sotterfugio, come del veleno.
Turkish (TR): İlk cinayette aynı anda altı yetişkinin öldürülmüş olması, zehir gibi sinsi bir yöntemin kullanılmış olabileceğini düşünmemize neden oldu.

Steam (ST): And for the second murder, we figured those two became sacrifices because they'd been unfortunately isolated from the rest of us.
Umineko Project (UP): And in the second murder, it was thought that those two had become sacrifices because they were unfortunately isolated from the rest of us.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And in the second murder, it was thought that those two had become sacrifices because they were unfortunately isolated from the rest of us.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、第二の殺人は、不幸にも皆から孤立してしまったことによって犠牲となったと思われる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、第二の殺人は、不幸にも皆から孤立してしまったことによって犠牲となったと思われる。
Russian (RU): А во втором убийстве считалось, что те двое стали жертвами, так как оказались, к несчастью, отделены от нас.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E no segundo assassinato, foi pensado que eles se tornaram sacrifícios porque, infelizmente, estavam isolados do resto de nós.
Vietnamese (VI): And in the second murder, it was thought that those two had become sacrifices because they were unfortunately isolated from the rest of us.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而在第二起殺人事件裡，犧牲者看來也是由於與大家孤立，而不幸遭到的殺害。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而在第二起杀人事件里，牺牲者看来也是由于与大家孤立，而不幸遭到的杀害。
Indonesian (IDN): And in the second murder, it was thought that those two had become sacrifices because they were unfortunately isolated from the rest of us.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E nel secondo omicidio, quei due erano diventati sacrifici perché sfortunatamente erano rimasti isolati dal resto di noi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E nel secondo omicidio, le due vittime erano diventate tali perché si erano sfortunatamente isolate dal resto del gruppo.
Turkish (TR): Ve ikinci cinayet için, bu ikisinin de kurban olduğunu düşündük çünkü ne yazık ki geri kalanımızdan izole olmuşlardı.

Steam (ST): From this, it was possible to imagine that the culprit wasn't a large number of adults, and that they wouldn't be capable of killing this large group gathered in the parlor all at once.
Umineko Project (UP): From this, we imagined that there weren't a great number of culprits, and they didn't have the ability to kill this large group gathered in the parlor all at once.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): From this, we imagined that the culprit wasn't a large number of adults, and they weren't someone who could kill this large group gathered in the parlor all at once.
PC Japanese (JP): ここから想像できるのは、犯人は決して大人数ではなく、客間に集まった大勢を一度に殺せてしまうような存在ではないこと、だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ここから想像できるのは、犯人は決して大人数ではなく、客間に集まった大勢を一度に殺せてしまうような存在ではないこと、だった。
Russian (RU): Из этого мы предположили, что преступников не было много, и они не были способны убить всю группу, собравшуюся в гостиной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A partir disso, nós imaginamos que não há um grande número de culpados, e que eles não teriam a habilidade de matar um grande grupo reunido na sala de visitas de uma única vez.
Vietnamese (VI): From this, we imagined that there weren't a great number of culprits, and they didn't have the ability to kill this large group gathered in the parlor all at once.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 能從這些想到的結論是：犯人絕不會有很多人，並沒有厲害到能將聚集在客廳中的這麼多人一次性殺光。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 能从这些想到的结论是：犯人绝不会有很多人，并没有厉害到能将聚集在客厅中的这么多人一次性杀光。
Indonesian (IDN): From this, we imagined that there weren't a great number of culprits, and they didn't have the ability to kill this large group gathered in the parlor all at once.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Da questi presupposti, deducemmo che i colpevoli non erano un gran numero di adulti, e non era qualcuno in grado di uccidere questo grande gruppo radunato nel salotto tutto in una volta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Da ciò potemmo dedurre che i colpevoli non erano un numero elevato di persone, e che non era qualcuno in grado di uccidere il grande gruppo che si era riunito nel salotto tutto insieme.
Turkish (TR): Buradan yola çıkarak, çok sayıda suçlu olmadığını, ve salonda toplanan bu büyük grubu bir anda öldürebilecek yetenekte olmadıklarını düşündük.

Steam (ST): Right now, in this parlor, there's George-aniki and me. Maria. Aunt Rosa. Genji-san, Gohda-san, Shannon-san, Kumasawa-san, ...and then, Doctor Nanjo, for a total of nine people.
Umineko Project (UP): Right now, in this parlor, there was George‐aniki and me, Maria, Auntie Rosa, Genji‐san, Gohda‐san, Shannon‐san, Kumasawa‐san, ......and finally Doctor Nanjo—a total of nine people were here.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Right now, in this parlor, George-aniki and I. Maria. Rosa oba-san. Genji-san, Gohda-san, Shannon-san, Kumasawa-san, ......and then, Doctor Nanjo, a total of nine people, were here.
PC Japanese (JP): この客間には今、俺に譲治の兄貴。真里亞。楼座叔母さん。そして源次さん、郷田さん、紗音ちゃん、熊沢さん、……あと南條先生で９人もの人間がいる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この客間には今、俺に譲治の兄貴。真里亞。楼座叔母さん。そして源次さん、郷田さん、紗音ちゃん、熊沢さん、……あと南條先生で９人もの人間がいる。
Russian (RU): В этот момент в гостиной находятся девять человек: Джордж‐аники и я, Мария, тётя Роза, Генджи‐сан, Года‐сан, Шаннон‐сан, Кумасава‐сан... а также доктор Нанджо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora mesmo, nesta sala, tem eu e o George‐aniki, a Maria, a tia Rosa, o Genji‐san, o Gohda‐san, a Shannon‐chan, a Kumasawa‐san e, ......finalmente, o doutor Nanjo. Um total de nove pessoas aqui.
Vietnamese (VI): Right now, in this parlor, there was George‐aniki and me, Maria, Auntie Rosa, Genji‐san, Gohda‐san, Shannon‐san, Kumasawa‐san, ......and finally Doctor Nanjo—a total of nine people were here.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此刻在這個客廳中，有我、讓治大哥、真里亞、樓座姑母，還有源次、鄉田、紗音、熊澤婆婆，……再加上南條大夫，共有九人之多。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此刻在这个客厅中，有我、让治大哥、真里亚、楼座姑母，还有源次、乡田、纱音、熊泽婆婆，……再加上南条大夫，共有九人之多。
Indonesian (IDN): Right now, in this parlor, there was George‐aniki and me, Maria, Auntie Rosa, Genji‐san, Gohda‐san, Shannon‐san, Kumasawa‐san, ......and finally Doctor Nanjo—a total of nine people were here.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ora, in questo salotto, George-aniki e io. Maria. Rosa oba-san. Genji-san, Gohda-san, Shannon-san, Kumasawa-san... e poi, il Dottor Nanjo, un totale di nove persone, erano qui.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In quel momento nel salotto c'eravamo io, il fratellone George, Maria, zia Rosa, Genji-san, Gouda-san, Shannon-san, Kumasawa-san... e il dottor Nanjo, per un totale di nove persone.
Turkish (TR): Şu anda bu salonda George-aniki ve ben, Maria, Rosa Teyze, Genji-san, Gohda-san, Shannon-san, Kumasawa-san, ......ve son olarak Doktor Nanjo vardı—toplam dokuz kişi.

Steam (ST): Furthermore, Aunt Rosa was even armed with a gun.
Umineko Project (UP): Furthermore, Auntie Rosa was even armed with a gun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Furthermore, Rosa oba-san was even armed with a gun.
PC Japanese (JP): しかも楼座叔母さんは銃で武装までしている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかも楼座叔母さんは銃で武装までしている。
Russian (RU): Более того, тётя Роза даже была вооружена ружьём.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além disso, a tia Rosa está com uma arma.
Vietnamese (VI): Furthermore, Auntie Rosa was even armed with a gun.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且樓座姑母甚至用槍做好了武裝。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且楼座姑母甚至用枪做好了武装。
Indonesian (IDN): Furthermore, Auntie Rosa was even armed with a gun.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Inoltre, Rosa oba-san era persino armata.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Inoltre, zia Rosa era persino munita di un fucile.
Turkish (TR): Üstelik Rosa Teyze'nin silahı dahi vardı.

Steam (ST): Surely, with this many people staying in this room, they wouldn't be able to touch us easily.
Umineko Project (UP): Surely, with this many people staying in this room, they wouldn't be able to touch us easily.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Surely, with this many people staying in this room, they wouldn't be able to touch us easily.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かにこの人数でこの部屋に留まっている以上、容易に手出しはできないに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 確かにこの人数でこの部屋に留まっている以上、容易に手出しはできないに違いない。
Russian (RU): Несомненно, когда так много людей находятся в этой комнате, они не смогут запросто разделаться с нами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Certamente, com todas essas pessoas aqui, o culpado não vai ser capaz de nos atacar facilmente.
Vietnamese (VI): Surely, with this many people staying in this room, they wouldn't be able to touch us easily.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 確實，只要我們以這樣的人數待在這房間裡，犯人就肯定是沒法輕易下手的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 确实，只要我们以这样的人数待在这房间里，犯人就肯定是没法轻易下手的。
Indonesian (IDN): Surely, with this many people staying in this room, they wouldn't be able to touch us easily.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Di certo, con così tante persone riunite in questa stanza, non sarebbero stati capaci di colpirci facilmente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Di certo non avrebbero potuto interferire tanto facilmente, non con così tante persone che sostavano nella stanza.
Turkish (TR): Kuşkusuz, bu odada bu kadar insan varken, bize kolayca dokunamazlardı.

Steam (ST): That feeling of security, along with the passage of time, allowed us to recover from the shock of that morning bit by bit...
Umineko Project (UP): That feeling of security, along with the passage of time, allowed us to recover from the shock of that morning bit by bit...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That feeling of security, along with the passage of time, allowed us to recover from the shock of that morning bit by bit...
PC Japanese (JP): その安心感は、時間と共に今朝のショックから少しずつ俺たちを立ち直らせていくのだった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その安心感は、時間と共に今朝のショックから少しずつ俺たちを立ち直らせていくのだった…。
Russian (RU): Это чувство безопасности с течением времени позволило нам постепенно восстановиться после утреннего шока...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O sentimento de segurança, junto com o passar do tempo, permitiu que nos recuperássemos, pouco a pouco, do choque de hoje de manhã...
Vietnamese (VI): That feeling of security, along with the passage of time, allowed us to recover from the shock of that morning bit by bit...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這份安心感，與時間一同，讓我們從今早的打擊中一點一點地振作了起來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这份安心感，与时间一同，让我们从今早的打击中一点一点地振作了起来…。
Indonesian (IDN): That feeling of security, along with the passage of time, allowed us to recover from the shock of that morning bit by bit...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel sentimento di sicurezza, insieme al passare del tempo, ci permise di riprenderci a poco a poco dallo shock di quella mattina...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quella sensazione di sicurezza, unita al passaggio del tempo, permise di riprenderci a poco a poco dallo shock di quella mattina...
Turkish (TR): Bu güven duygusu, geçen zamanla birlikte, bu sabah yaşadığımız şoku yavaş yavaş atlatmamızı sağladı...

Steam (ST): By the way, lunchtime had just ended for us. However, it had been a canned food lunch, a far cry from the dinner last night that Gohda-san had skillfully made for us.
Umineko Project (UP): Incidentally, lunchtime had just ended for us.{n}However, it had been a canned‐food lunch, a far cry from last night's dinner which Gohda‐san had skillfully made for us.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By the way, lunchtime had just ended for us. However, it had been a canned food lunch, a far cry from last night's dinner which Gohda-san had skillfully made for us.
PC Japanese (JP): ちなみに俺たちはランチタイムを終えたばかりだ。もっとも、郷田さんが腕を振るってくれた昨夜のディナーからは程遠い、缶詰のランチだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ちなみに俺たちはランチタイムを終えたばかりだ。{n}もっとも、郷田さんが腕を振るってくれた昨夜のディナーからは程遠い、缶詰のランチだった。
Russian (RU): Кстати, только что завершился наш обед.{n}Однако этот обед из консервов сильно отличался от умело приготовленного Годой‐саном ужина прошлым вечером.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Incidentalmente, a hora do almoço acabou para nós.{n}No entanto, ainda tem comida enlatada e sobras do jantar que o Gohda‐san fez para nós, com todas as suas habilidades.
Vietnamese (VI): Incidentally, lunchtime had just ended for us.{n}However, it had been a canned‐food lunch, a far cry from last night's dinner which Gohda‐san had skillfully made for us.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 順便一提，我們剛剛用完午餐。{n}不過，那也只是與昨晚鄉田大展身手做的晚餐，相去甚遠的罐頭餐。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 顺便一提，我们刚刚用完午餐。{n}不过，那也只是与昨晚乡田大展身手做的晚餐，相去甚远的罐头餐。
Indonesian (IDN): Incidentally, lunchtime had just ended for us.{n}However, it had been a canned‐food lunch, a far cry from last night's dinner which Gohda‐san had skillfully made for us.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A proposito, per noi il pranzo era appena finito. Tuttavia, fu a base di cibo in scatola, niente rispetto alla cena della scorsa notte che Gohda-san ci aveva abilmente preparato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per caso fortuito, avevamo appena terminato di pranzare.{n}Tuttavia, fu a base di cibo in scatola, il quale era decisamente inferiore alla cena abilmente preparata da Gouda-san la sera precedente...
Turkish (TR): Bu arada, öğle yemeği bizim için yeni sona ermişti.{n}Ancak, dün gece Gohda-san'ın bizim için ustalıkla hazırlamış olduğu akşam yemeğinden çok farklı olarak, konserve yiyeceklerden oluşan bir öğle yemeğiydi.

Steam (ST): ...Aunt Rosa also suspected that poison may have been used in the first murder.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Auntie Rosa too had suspected that poison had been used in the murder of those six people.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Rosa oba-san had also suspected that poison had been used in the murder of those six people.
PC Japanese (JP): …楼座叔母さんもまた、親父たち６人の殺人は毒殺ではないかと疑っていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …楼座叔母さんもまた、親父たち６人の殺人は毒殺ではないかと疑っていた。
Russian (RU): ...Тётя Роза также подозревала, что для убийства тех шестерых был использован яд..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...A tia Rosa suspeita que foi usado veneno no assassinato dos seis.
Vietnamese (VI): ...Auntie Rosa too had suspected that poison had been used in the murder of those six people.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …樓座姑母也懷疑，老爸他們六人有可能是死於毒殺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …楼座姑母也怀疑，老爸他们六人有可能是死于毒杀。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Auntie Rosa too had suspected that poison had been used in the murder of those six people.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche Rosa oba-san aveva sospettato che fosse stato usato del veleno nell'omicidio di quelle sei persone.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Anche zia Rosa aveva sospettato che nell'omicidio di mio padre e degli altri cinque fosse stato usato del veleno...
Turkish (TR): ...Rosa Teyze de o altı kişinin öldürülmesinde zehir kullanıldığından şüphelenmişti.

Steam (ST): ...So, we probably couldn't deny the possibility that the culprit had snuck into the kitchen during all that confusion in the morning...and mixed poison in with the ingredients there.
Umineko Project (UP): ...So, we probably couldn't deny the possibility that the culprit had snuck into the kitchen during all that confusion in the morning, and mixed poison in with the ingredients there.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...So, we probably couldn't deny the possibility that the culprit had snuck into the kitchen during all that confusion in the morning, and mixed poison in with the ingredients there.
PC Japanese (JP): …ならば、朝の混乱中に犯人が厨房に侵入し、食材に毒物を混入している可能性も否めない、ということなのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …ならば、朝の混乱中に犯人が厨房に侵入し、食材に毒物を混入している可能性も否めない、ということなのだろう。
Russian (RU): ...Отсюда мы, вероятно, не можем отрицать возможности, что преступник прокрался на кухню во время утренней неразберихи и подмешал яд в ингредиенты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Por isso, nós não podemos negar a possibilidade do culpado ter entrado na cozinha durante toda a confusão da manhã, e misturando veneno aos ingredientes.
Vietnamese (VI): ...So, we probably couldn't deny the possibility that the culprit had snuck into the kitchen during all that confusion in the morning, and mixed poison in with the ingredients there.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …若真是這樣，那麼犯人趁著早晨的混亂闖進廚房，在食材裡下了毒的可能性，也應該是無法排除的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …若真是这样，那么犯人趁着早晨的混乱闯进厨房，在食材里下了毒的可能性，也应该是无法排除的。
Indonesian (IDN): ...So, we probably couldn't deny the possibility that the culprit had snuck into the kitchen during all that confusion in the morning, and mixed poison in with the ingredients there.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi, probabilmente non potevamo escludere la possibilità che il colpevole si fosse infilato in cucina durante tutta quella confusione di mattina, e mischiato del veleno negli ingredienti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per cui non si poteva escludere la possibilità che, durante lo scompiglio di quella mattina, il colpevole si fosse infiltrato in cucina e avesse aggiunto del veleno negli ingredienti...
Turkish (TR): ...Bu yüzden, suçlunun sabahki o karmaşa sırasında mutfağa gizlice girmiş ve oradaki malzemelere zehir karıştırmış olma ihtimalini göz ardı edemezdik.

Steam (ST): ...Aunt Rosa gave orders to all of us saying that, until the police came, we mustn't put anything into our mouths except safe things like canned food.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Auntie Rosa had ordered all of us not to put anything into our mouths except safe foods like canned food, until the police came.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Rosa oba-san ordered all of us that, until the police came, we should not put anything into our mouths except safe foods like canned food.
PC Japanese (JP): ……楼座叔母さんは、警察が来るまで、缶詰などの安全な食品以外は口にしないよう全員に厳命したのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……楼座叔母さんは、警察が来るまで、缶詰などの安全な食品以外は口にしないよう全員に厳命したのだった。
Russian (RU): ......Тётя Роза приказала всем нам до прибытия полиции не есть ничего, кроме безопасной еды, вроде консервов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela ordenou que nenhum de nós colocasse nada em nossas bocas além de comidas seguras, como enlatados, até a polícia chegar.
Vietnamese (VI): ......Auntie Rosa had ordered all of us not to put anything into our mouths except safe foods like canned food, until the police came.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……樓座姑母嚴命了所有人，在警察到來之前，除了罐頭等安全的食品以外，不要去吃其他東西。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……楼座姑母严命了所有人，在警察到来之前，除了罐头等安全的食品以外，不要去吃其他东西。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Auntie Rosa had ordered all of us not to put anything into our mouths except safe foods like canned food, until the police came.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Rosa oba-san ci ordinò di non mettere niente in bocca eccetto cibi sicuri come quelli in scatola, almeno fino a quando non sarebbe arrivata la polizia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Zia Rosa ordinò a tutti noi di non mangiare nulla fino all'arrivo delle forze dell'ordine, ad eccezione di alimenti sicuri come quelli in contenitori di latta.
Turkish (TR): ......Rosa Teyze hepimize polis gelene kadar konserve gibi güvenli yiyecekler dışında ağzımıza hiçbir şey sürmememizi emretmişti.

Steam (ST): As a cook, Gohda-san must've felt very let down.
Umineko Project (UP): As a cook, Gohda‐san must have felt very let down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As a cook, Gohda-san must have felt very let down.
PC Japanese (JP): 料理人の郷田さんにとって、それはよほど残念なことだったに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 料理人の郷田さんにとって、それはよほど残念なことだったに違いない。
Russian (RU): Как повар, Года‐сан, должно быть, чувствовал себя очень огорчённым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como cozinheiro, o Gohda‐san deve ter ficado bastante decepcionado.
Vietnamese (VI): As a cook, Gohda‐san must have felt very let down.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這對身為廚師的鄉田來說，無疑是個使他頗為遺憾的決定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这对身为厨师的乡田来说，无疑是个使他颇为遗憾的决定。
Indonesian (IDN): As a cook, Gohda‐san must have felt very let down.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come cuoco, Gohda-san deve essersi sentito molto deluso.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In qualità di cuoco, Gouda-san sicuramente ne era molto affranto.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san bir aşçı olarak çok hayal kırıklığına uğramış olmalı.

Steam (ST): Apparently eager to display his skill anyway, he said he at least wanted to grab some plates and arrange the canned food on them.
Umineko Project (UP): As though he wanted to display his skill anyway, he said that he at least wanted to bring the plates and pile them up with canned food.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As though he wanted to display his skill anyway, Gohda-san said that he at least wanted to bring the plates and pile them up with canned food.
PC Japanese (JP): それでもせめて腕を振るいたかったらしく、郷田さんはお皿を持ってきて、せめて缶詰の盛り付けをしたいと言い出すのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それでもせめて腕を振るいたかったらしく、郷田さんはお皿を持ってきて、せめて缶詰の盛り付けをしたいと言い出すのだった。
Russian (RU): Года‐сан, как будто желая так или иначе продемонстрировать свои умения, предложил хотя бы принести тарелки и сложить консервы на них.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para mostrar suas habilidades de confecção, ele disse que queria ao menos trazer as latas empilhadas nos pratos.
Vietnamese (VI): As though he wanted to display his skill anyway, he said that he at least wanted to bring the plates and pile them up with canned food.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但儘管如此，鄉田似乎也還是想露露手藝。他拿來了盤子，提出了至少想給罐頭食品擺擺盤的想法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但尽管如此，乡田似乎也还是想露露手艺。他拿来了盘子，提出了至少想给罐头食品摆摆盘的想法。
Indonesian (IDN): As though he wanted to display his skill anyway, he said that he at least wanted to bring the plates and pile them up with canned food.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dato che voleva mostrare comunque le sue abilità, Gohda-san disse che almeno voleva portare i piatti e preparare il cibo in scatola.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Gouda-san chiese di poter quantomeno servire il cibo in scatola su dei piatti, apparentemente bramoso di sfoggiare comunque le sue capacità.
Turkish (TR): Yine de becerisini göstermek istercesine, en azından tabakları getirip konserve yiyeceklerle doldurmak istediğini söyledi.

Steam (ST): At first, Aunt Rosa had been reluctant, examining each one of the plates that were brought, but she hadn't been able to find anything to complain about, and Gohda's "Chef's Pick Canned Food Lunch Combo" was born.
Umineko Project (UP): At first, Auntie Rosa had been reluctant, examining each one of the plates that were brought, but she hadn't been able to find anything to complain about, and Gohda‐san's "Chef's Pick Canned Food Combo Lunch" had become a reality.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At first, Rosa oba-san had been reluctant, examining each one of the plates that were brought, but she hadn't been able to find anything to complain about, and Gohda's 'Chef's Pick Canned Food Combo Lunch' was born.
PC Japanese (JP): 最初は楼座叔母さんも渋り、持ってこさせた皿をいちいち点検していたが、文句の付け所が特に見付からず、郷田さんによる、“シェフの気まぐれ風缶詰の盛り合わせランチ”はこうして実現したのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 最初は楼座叔母さんも渋り、持ってこさせた皿をいちいち点検していたが、文句の付け所が特に見付からず、郷田さんによる、“シェフの気まぐれ風缶詰の盛り合わせランチ”はこうして実現したのだった。

Steam (ST): "Wolves and Sheep Puzzle". It was a phrase that Aunt Rosa had said this morning when we'd gone to call on Jessica.

Steam (ST): On the right bank, there are two wolves and two sheep. There's a boat that as many as two animals can ride on, and using it, you have to move all four of them to the opposite left bank.
Umineko Project (UP): On the right bank, there are two wolves and two sheep.{n}There is a boat that as many as two animals can ride on, and using it, you have to move all four of them to the opposite left bank.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On the right bank, there are two wolves and two sheep. There is a boat that as many as two animals can ride on, and using it, you have to move all four of them to the opposite left bank.

Russian (RU): На правом берегу два волка и две овцы.{n}Используя лодку, на которой могут плыть не более двух животных, нужно переместить всех четверых на противоположный левый берег. Такова задача.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na margem direita, tem dois lobos e dois carneiros.{n}Há um bote no qual cabe apenas dois animais, e através dele você move todos os quatro animais para o lado oposto da margem.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 右边的岸上，有两只狼与两只羊。{n}而河里有一条最多能乘两只动物的船。这道题的目的，就是要用这条船，将四只动物全部运到左边的对岸。

Umineko Project (UP): The first is regarding the boat.{n}It can be paddled by wolves or sheep, and even just by one animal on its own.{n}But it can only hold up to two.

Umineko Project (UP): On either bank or even the boat, there must not be more wolves than sheep.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On either bank or even the boat, there must not be more wolves than sheep.

Vietnamese (VI): It's a puzzle about how to shuttle them across in the boat under these conditions.

Steam (ST): By the way, the right answer is to move both wolves to the opposite bank in the first turn. Then one wolf comes back.
Umineko Project (UP): By the way, the right answer is: On the first turn, move both wolves to the opposite bank.{n}Then one wolf comes back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By the way, the right answer is to move both wolves to the opposite bank in the first turn. Then one wolf comes back.
PC Japanese (JP): ちなみに正解は、第１ターンに狼２匹を対岸に。そして狼１匹が戻る。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ちなみに正解は、第１ターンに狼２匹を対岸に。{n}そして狼１匹が戻る。
Russian (RU): Между прочим, правильный ответ в том, что в первую очередь на другой берег нужно переправить обоих волков.{n}Потом один волк возвращается.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A propósito, a resposta correta é: na primeira rodada, mova ambos os lobos para a margem oposta.{n}Então um lobo vai voltar.
Vietnamese (VI): By the way, the right answer is: On the first turn, move both wolves to the opposite bank.{n}Then one wolf comes back.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 附帶一提，正確答案是在第一回合將兩只狼送向對岸。{n}然後回去一只狼。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Comunque sia, la soluzione giusta è di portare entrambi i lupi alla sponda opposta con il primo viaggio.{n}E poi tornare indietro con un lupo.
Turkish (TR): Bu arada, doğru cevap şu: İlk turda her iki kurdu da karşı kıyıya geçirirsiniz.{n}Sonrasında bir kurt geri gelir.

Steam (ST): On the second turn, you move two sheep to the opposite bank. Then one wolf comes back.
Umineko Project (UP): On the second turn, move two sheep to the opposite bank.{n}Then one wolf comes back.

Steam (ST): Then on the third turn, you put that last wolf that was on the right bank on the boat and cross to the opposite bank, and congratulations, transport successful.

Steam (ST): This book uses wolves and sheep as an example, but lots of people probably know of this game using different characters...

Steam (ST): It looked like Maria wanted to test whether I too could solve the puzzles she knew how to solve, and she kept showing me different pages, saying "solve this one" and "this one's hard".
Umineko Project (UP): It looked like Maria wanted to test whether I too could solve the puzzles she knew how to solve, and she kept showing me different pages, saying "solve this one" and "this one's hard".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It looked like Maria wanted to test whether I too could solve the puzzles she knew how to solve, and she kept showing me different pages, saying 'solve this one' and 'this one's hard'.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は、自分が解き方を知っているパズルを、俺も解けるか試したいらしくて、これを解け、これは難しい等々、様々なページを開いて見せるのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 真里亞は、自分が解き方を知っているパズルを、俺も解けるか試したいらしくて、これを解け、これは難しい等々、様々なページを開いて見せるのだった。
Russian (RU): Было похоже, что Мария хочет проверить, удастся ли мне разгадать загадки, решения которых ей были известны, и она продолжала показывать разные страницы, говоря "разгадай вот это" и "эта трудная".

Vietnamese (VI): It looked like Maria wanted to test whether I too could solve the puzzles she knew how to solve, and she kept showing me different pages, saying "solve this one" and "this one's hard".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞似乎是想考考我，看我是不是也解得開這道她知道解法的智力題，一邊說著“解解這道題”“這道題很難”什麼的，一頁又一頁地翻給我看。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚似乎是想考考我，看我是不是也解得开这道她知道解法的智力题，一边说着“解解这道题”“这道题很难”什么的，一页又一页地翻给我看。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Sembrava che Maria volesse vedere se anche io fossi in grado di venire a capo dei rompicapi di cui lei conosceva la risposta, e mi mostrò varie pagine, dicendomi di risolvere quest'enigma, o che quest'altro era uno difficile.

Steam (ST): ...When we decided to go and get Jessica, we talked about how many men should go, and Aunt Rosa mentioned the "Wolves and Sheep Puzzle", saying we should all go together...
Umineko Project (UP): ...When we'd decided to go call Jessica, we had been talking about how many men should go, and Auntie Rosa mentioned the "Wolves and Sheep Puzzle", and said that we should all go together......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...When we'd decided to call Jessica, we had been talking about how many men should go, and Rosa oba-san had mentioned 'Wolves and Sheep Puzzle', saying that we should all go together......
PC Japanese (JP): …朱志香を呼びにいこうってことになって、男が何人かで行けばいいだろう何て言ったら、楼座叔母さんが“狼と羊のパズル”と口にして、みんなで一緒に行こうと言い出したのだ……。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Quando decidirmos ir juntos chamar a Jessica, nós estávamos falando sobre quantos homens deveriam ir, e a tia Rosa mencionou "Os Lobos e o Enigma do Carneiro", e disse que deveríamos ir todos juntos......

Steam (ST): So was she thinking...that we'd be safe if the number of wolves and sheep was in balance, but that the wolves would bear their fangs if the situation changed...?
Umineko Project (UP): And when the number of wolves and sheep is balanced, we're safe, but when a situation comes up where that isn't the case, the wolves will bear their fangs—is that what she's thinking......?

PC Japanese (JP): そして、狼と羊の数が均衡している時は安全だが、それが崩れた環境が現れた時、狼は牙を剥くと、…そう考えている……？

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E quando o número de lobos e carneiros está equilibrado, estamos seguros, mas quando acontece uma situação em que esse não é o caso, os lobos vão mostrar as suas presas — era o que ela estava pensando......?

Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且她还认为，虽然狼与羊的数量保持均衡时是安全的，但只要这平衡被打破，…狼就会露出獠牙……？
Indonesian (IDN): And when the number of wolves and sheep is balanced, we're safe, but when a situation comes up where that isn't the case, the wolves will bear their fangs—is that what she's thinking......?
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E quando il numero di lupi e pecore era bilanciato, saremmo stati al sicuro, ma quando si veniva a creare una situazione diversa, i lupi avrebbero scoperto le zanne... è questo ciò che pensava...?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E pensava che saremmo stati al sicuro finché il numero dei lupi e delle pecore fosse rimasto bilanciato, ma che... quando la situazione sarebbe degenerata, i lupi avrebbero mostrato gli artigli...?

Steam (ST): She'd sniffed out the possibility that, while she didn't know whether it was all of them or some of them, there were "wolves" hiding among them.
Umineko Project (UP): While she didn't know whether it was all of them or just some, she had sniffed out the possibility that "wolves" were hiding among them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had sniffed out the possibility that, while she didn't know whether it was all of them or a group, some 'wolves' were hiding among them.

Steam (ST): And because she'd reached that conclusion, when we went to Jessica's room... and learned that Jessica had been killed after being alone with a servant, Kanon, ......it isn't hard to imagine why Aunt Rosa suspected the servants so persistently...
Umineko Project (UP): And considering that she had that idea already in mind when we went to Jessica's room, where Jessica had been alone with a servant, Kanon, and had been killed, .........it isn't hard to imagine why Auntie Rosa had suspected the servants so persistently...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And because she had reached that conclusion, when we went to Jessica's room, where Jessica had been alone with a servant, Kanon, and had been killed, .........it isn't hard to imagine why Rosa oba-san had suspected the servants so persistently...
PC Japanese (JP): そして、この考えに至った上で、朱志香の部屋に行き、朱志香と使用人の嘉音が二人きりになって朱志香が殺されたとなれば、………あれだけ使用人を執拗に疑った楼座叔母さんの胸中を察することは、想像に難しくない…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、この考えに至った上で、朱志香の部屋に行き、朱志香と使用人の嘉音が二人きりになって朱志香が殺されたとなれば、………あれだけ使用人を執拗に疑った楼座叔母さんの胸中を察することは、想像に難しくない…。
Russian (RU): И поскольку она пришла к этому выводу, когда мы отправились в комнату Джессики, где та оставалась одна со слугой, Каноном, и оказалась убита... Нетрудно было представить, почему тётя Роза так настойчиво подозревала прислугу...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E considerando que ela já tinha essa ideia em mente quando foi ao quarto da Jessica, onde ela estava sozinha com um serviçal, Kanon, e foi morta, .........não é difícil imaginar o motivo da tia Rosa suspeitar dos serviçais de forma tão persistente...
Vietnamese (VI): And considering that she had that idea already in mind when we went to Jessica's room, where Jessica had been alone with a servant, Kanon, and had been killed, .........it isn't hard to imagine why Auntie Rosa had suspected the servants so persistently...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且，如果她是在想到了這一點之後，去了朱志香的房間，而朱志香又是在與傭人嘉音二人獨處時遭到殺害的話，………那麼會去如此執拗地懷疑傭人的樓座姑母，她內心中的想法，就真的不難想像了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且，如果她是在想到了这一点之后，去了朱志香的房间，而朱志香又是在与佣人嘉音二人独处时遭到杀害的话，………那么会去如此执拗地怀疑佣人的楼座姑母，她内心中的想法，就真的不难想象了…。
Indonesian (IDN): And considering that she had that idea already in mind when we went to Jessica's room, where Jessica had been alone with a servant, Kanon, and had been killed, .........it isn't hard to imagine why Auntie Rosa had suspected the servants so persistently...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E dato che aveva raggiunto quella conclusione, quando siamo andati verso la stanza di Jessica, dove Jessica era stata sola con un domestico, Kanon, ed era stata uccisa... non era difficile immaginare perché Rosa oba-san sospettasse così insistentemente dei domestici...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ed essendo arrivata a tale conclusione, all'arrivo nella stanza di Jessica, vedendo Jessica uccisa dopo essere stata sola con il domestico Kanon... non era difficile immaginare le motivazioni per cui zia Rosa stesse focalizzando così tanto i suoi sospetti verso i domestici...
Turkish (TR): Ve Jessica'nın Kanon adında bir hizmetkârla yalnız kaldığı, ve öldürüldüğü odaya gittiğimizde de aklında bu fikrin olduğunu düşünürsek, .........Rosa Teyze'nin ısrarla neden hizmetkârlardan şüphelendiğini tahmin etmek zor değil...

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "Being able to create delicious food when you buy delicious ingredients is hardly special. ...My master taught me that a true cook needs to perfect their ability to make delicious food from whatever is on hand."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's natural that you can create delicious food if you buy delicious ingredients. ......My teacher taught me that perfecting your ability to make delicious food from whatever is at hand is what makes you a true cook."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's natural that you can create delicious food if you buy delicious ingredients. ......My master taught me that perfecting your ability to make delicious food from whatever is at hand is what makes you a true cook."
PC Japanese (JP): 「美味しい材料を買ってきて美味しい料理が作れるのは当り前です。……私は師匠に、有り合わせの物で美味しく作る賄い料理を極めてこそ、真の料理人だと習いました。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「美味しい材料を買ってきて美味しい料理が作れるのは当り前です。……私は師匠に、有り合わせの物で美味しく作る賄い料理を極めてこそ、真の料理人だと習いました」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É natural que você possa preparar deliciosas refeições se você comprar deliciosos ingredientes. ......Meu professor me ensinou que aperfeiçoar suas habilidades para fazer refeições com qualquer coisa que esteja à disposição é o que faz de você um verdadeiro cozinheiro."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「买来美味的食材，便也就理所当然能做成美味的料理。……鄙人曾受过师父教导，唯有将用手边现有的食材烹饪成的美味员工餐，烹调至极致，方才为真正的厨师。」

Turkish (TR): "Lezzetli malzemeler kullandığınız sürece lezzetli yemekler yapabilmeniz oldukça doğaldır. ......Öğretmenim bana, elindeki her malzemeyle lezzetli yemekler yapma becerisini mükemmelleştirmenin insanı gerçek bir aşçı yapan şey olduğunu öğretmişti."

Russian (RU): "......Хоть это и жаль, что он приготовлен из ингредиентов, предназначавшихся для всех членов семьи."

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...È un peccato però che sia stata preparata con ingredienti intesi per essere consumati dai membri della famiglia."

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Steam (ST): "I'm sure Rosa-san is tired after everything that happened this morning. It is only natural."
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm sure that Rosa‐san is also tired after everything that happened this morning. It is only natural."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I'm sure that Rosa-san is also tired after everything that happened this morning. It is only natural."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「楼座さんも、朝からの色々でお疲れなのでしょう。無理もないことです」
Russian (RU): "Я уверен, что Роза‐сан тоже устала после всего случившегося сегодня утром. Это вполне естественно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu tenho certeza de que a Rosa‐san também está cansada depois de tudo que aconteceu essa manhã. Tal coisa é natural."
Vietnamese (VI): "I'm sure that Rosa‐san is also tired after everything that happened this morning. It is only natural."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「楼座女士也是被从早上开始的种种变故折腾累了吧。这也是没办法的事。」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Anche Rosa-san sarà stanca, dopo tutto quello che è successo stamattina.{n}È comprensibile."

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo

Umineko Project (UP): "But thanks to that, we get to eat some soup made from delicious ingredients, hoh‐hoh‐ho."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "But thanks to that, we get to drink some soup made from delicious ingredients, hoh-hoh-ho."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも、そのお陰で、おいしい食材のスープが飲めるのですからねぇ、ほっほっほ」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas graças a isso, nós podemos comer uma sopa feita com ingredientes deliciosos, hoh‐hoh‐ho."
Vietnamese (VI): "But thanks to that, we get to eat some soup made from delicious ingredients, hoh‐hoh‐ho."

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ma grazie a ciò possiamo bere della zuppa fatta con dei deliziosi ingredienti, ohohoh."

Steam (ST): Rosa had fervently warned everyone that they didn't understand the danger they were in, and that they must assume that poison was mixed in with the food.
Umineko Project (UP): Rosa had fervently told everyone that they didn't realize the danger they were in, and that they must suspect that poison was mixed in with the food.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa had fervently told everyone that they didn't notice the danger they were in, and that they must suspect that poison was mixed in with the food.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は一同に、危機感が足りない、毒の混入も疑えと熱弁をふるった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 楼座は一同に、危機感が足りない、毒の混入も疑えと熱弁をふるった。
Russian (RU): Роза убеждённо заявила всем, что они не замечают опасности, в которой находятся, и им следует подозревать, что пища может быть отравлена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa intensamente disse para todos que eles não estavam percebendo o perigo daquilo, e que eles deveriam suspeitar que algum veneno havia sido misturado na comida.
Vietnamese (VI): Rosa had fervently told everyone that they didn't realize the danger they were in, and that they must suspect that poison was mixed in with the food.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座曾向大家激烈地主張，說大家危機感不足，也該去懷疑食物裡有可能被下了毒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座曾向大家激烈地主张，说大家危机感不足，也该去怀疑食物里有可能被下了毒。
Indonesian (IDN): Rosa had fervently told everyone that they didn't realize the danger they were in, and that they must suspect that poison was mixed in with the food.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rosa aveva detto con fervore a tutti che non si erano accorti del pericolo in cui si trovavano, e che dovevano sospettare che il cibo fosse stato avvelenato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Rosa si era lanciata in un'invettiva in cui disse a tutti i presenti che non erano abbastanza in allarme, e che dovevano sospettare che il cibo fosse stato avvelenato.
Turkish (TR): Rosa hararetle herkese içinde bulundukları tehlikenin farkında olmadıklarını ve yemeğe zehir karıştırıldığından şüphelenmeleri gerektiğini söylemişti.

Steam (ST): The mood at the time had led them to agree, but hunger wasn't something that could be swayed by a momentary emotion like that.
Umineko Project (UP): The atmosphere in that place had led to their agreement, but their hunger wouldn't be overcome by that momentary emotion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The atmosphere in this place accepted that, but their hunger wouldn't be overcome by that momentary emotion.
PC Japanese (JP): その場の雰囲気でそれに納得してしまったが、空腹というものはそんな一時の感情で納得してくれるものではなかったということだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その場の雰囲気でそれに納得してしまったが、空腹というものはそんな一時の感情で納得してくれるものではなかったということだ。
Russian (RU): Атмосфера в этом месте служила тому подтверждением, но их голод было не преодолеть той спонтанной эмоцией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O clima no ambiente acabou levando eles a um acordo, mas a fome deles não seria superada por uma emoção momentânea.
Vietnamese (VI): The atmosphere in that place had led to their agreement, but their hunger wouldn't be overcome by that momentary emotion.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 儘管由於當時的氣氛，他們同意了這一點，但空著的肚子可不會因這一時的情緒就停止抗議。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 尽管由于当时的气氛，他们同意了这一点，但空着的肚子可不会因这一时的情绪就停止抗议。
Indonesian (IDN): The atmosphere in that place had led to their agreement, but their hunger wouldn't be overcome by that momentary emotion.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): L'atmosfera di quel luogo li aveva persuasi, ma il loro stomaco vuoto non si sarebbe lasciato dissuadere da un simile sentimento passeggero.
Turkish (TR): Mekândaki atmosfer anlaşmalarına yol açmıştı, ama açlıklarının üstesinden o anlık duyguyla gelemeyeceklerdi.

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "Ironically, we've ended up with a soup that we normally wouldn't be able to savor. If possible, I would like to serve it to everyone in the parlor, but..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Ironically, it has become a soup that we normally wouldn't be able to savor. If possible, I would like to also serve it to everyone in the parlor, but..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ironically, it has become a soup that we normally wouldn't be able to savor. I would like to also serve it to everyone in the parlor, but...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「皮肉にも、普段の私たちではとても味わえないスープとなりました。できるなら、客間の皆さんにもぜひ振舞いたいところなのですが…？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「皮肉にも、普段の私たちではとても味わえないスープとなりました。できるなら、客間の皆さんにもぜひ振舞いたいところなのですが…？」
Russian (RU): "Какая ирония: получился суп, которым нам не удалось бы насладиться в обычных условиях. Я бы так же хотел подать его всем в гостиной, но..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ironicamente, era para ser uma sopa que normalmente não possuía sabor. Se possível, eu gostaria de servir a todos na sala de visitas, mas..."
Vietnamese (VI): "Ironically, it has become a soup that we normally wouldn't be able to savor. If possible, I would like to also serve it to everyone in the parlor, but..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「諷刺的是，這倒是成了平常的我們怎麼都享用不到的西餐湯了。如果可以的話，鄙人也想去款待下客廳裡的諸位…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「讽刺的是，这倒是成了平常的我们怎么都享用不到的西餐汤了。如果可以的话，鄙人也想去款待下客厅里的诸位…」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ironically, it has become a soup that we normally wouldn't be able to savor. If possible, I would like to also serve it to everyone in the parlor, but..."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ironicamente, è diventata una zuppa che normalmente non assaggeremmo. {n}Mi piacerebbe servirla anche a tutti quanti in salotto, ma...?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È buffo come abbia creato una zuppa che normalmente non potremmo assaporare. Mi piacerebbe molto poterla servire anche a chi è in salotto, ma..."

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): "Hohohohoh. Skillfully taking a breather when no one's looking is also an important skill for a servant, isn't it?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Hoh‐hoh‐hoh‐ho. Skillfully taking a breather when no one is looking is one of the things you learn as a servant, after all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hoh-hoh-hoh-ho. Skillfully taking a breather when no one is looking is also something a servant knows, isn't it."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ほっほっほっほ。見えないところで上手に息抜きするのも、使用人の心得でございますものねぇ」
Russian (RU): "Хо‐хо‐хо‐хо. Умело устроить себе передышку, пока никто не видит, должен уметь каждый слуга, не так ли?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hoh‐hoh‐hoh‐ho. Afinal, habilidosamente tirar um momento para respirar quando ninguém está olhando é uma das coisas que você aprende quando é um serviçal, não é?"

Steam (ST): When Kumasawa cackled, Shannon and Gohda laughed too.
Umineko Project (UP): Kumasawa laughed loudly, and Shannon and Gohda laughed with her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Kumasawa cackled, Shannon and Gohda also laughed.
PC Japanese (JP): 熊沢がからからと笑うと、紗音と郷田も一緒に笑う。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 熊沢がからからと笑うと、紗音と郷田も一緒に笑う。
Russian (RU): Пока Кумасава кудахтала, Шаннон и Года тоже рассмеялись.

Vietnamese (VI): Kumasawa laughed loudly, and Shannon and Gohda laughed with her.

Steam (ST): It seemed that, in this space where only their fellow servants were gathered, they could relax quite a bit.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that, in an area where only their fellow servants were gathered, they could be very relaxed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that, in an area where only their fellow servants were gathered, they could be very relaxed.
PC Japanese (JP): 使用人仲間たちだけが集まったこの空間は、彼らにとってとてもリラックスできるもののようだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 使用人仲間たちだけが集まったこの空間は、彼らにとってとてもリラックスできるもののようだった。
Russian (RU): Похоже лишь здесь, где вся их братия слуг была в сборе, они могли расслабиться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece que, na área onde apenas conservos estão reunidos, eles podiam relaxar.
Vietnamese (VI): It seemed that, in an area where only their fellow servants were gathered, they could be very relaxed.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 只有傭人同事聚在一起的這個空間，似乎對他們來說，是個非常能夠放鬆身心的場所。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 只有佣人同事聚在一起的这个空间，似乎对他们来说，是个非常能够放松身心的场所。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che, in una zona dov'erano radunati soltanto i loro compagni domestici, potessero essere molto rilassati.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I domestici sembravano riuscire a rilassarsi considerevolmente dentro una zona in cui erano radunati soltanto i loro compagni.
Turkish (TR): Görünüşe göre, sadece hizmetkâr arkadaşların toplandığı bir alanda çok rahat davranabiliyorlardı.

Steam (ST): Shannon didn't like Gohda's occasional dishonesty, but she knew that there was no falsehood in his childish smile when he cooked, nor in his desire for people to enjoy his food.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon didn't like Gohda's occasional dishonesty, but she knew that there was no falsehood in his childish smile when he cooked, nor in his desire that people enjoy his food.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon didn't like Gohda's occasional dishonesty, but she knew that there was no falsehood in his childish smile when he cooked food, nor in his desire that people enjoy his food.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は、郷田がたまに見せるズルさが苦手だったが、料理を作る時の子どもらしい笑顔と、自分の料理でみんなに喜んでもらいたいという気持ちに関してだけは偽りがないことを知っていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 紗音は、郷田がたまに見せるズルさが苦手だったが、料理を作る時の子どもらしい笑顔と、自分の料理でみんなに喜んでもらいたいという気持ちに関してだけは偽りがないことを知っていた。
Russian (RU): Шаннон не нравилась случавшаяся непорядочность Годы, но она знала, что не было лжи ни в его наивной улыбке, когда он готовил еду, ни в его стремлении дать людям насладиться его пищей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon não gostava da ocasional desonestidade de Gohda, mas ela sabia que não havia falsidade naquele sorriso infantil quando ele cozinhava, nem em seu desejo pelas pessoas aproveitarem sua comida.
Vietnamese (VI): Shannon didn't like Gohda's occasional dishonesty, but she knew that there was no falsehood in his childish smile when he cooked, nor in his desire that people enjoy his food.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音雖然並不怎麼擅長應付鄉田偶爾會顯露出來的狡猾之處，但她清楚，鄉田那烹飪時有如孩子般的笑臉，以及想用自己的飯菜討得眾人歡心的心情，絕無半點虛假。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音虽然并不怎么擅长应付乡田偶尔会显露出来的狡猾之处，但她清楚，乡田那烹饪时有如孩子般的笑脸，以及想用自己的饭菜讨得众人欢心的心情，绝无半点虚假。
Indonesian (IDN): Shannon didn't like Gohda's occasional dishonesty, but she knew that there was no falsehood in his childish smile when he cooked, nor in his desire that people enjoy his food.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A Shannon non piaceva l'occasionale disonestà di Gohda, ma sapeva che non c'era alcuna falsità nel suo sorriso da bambino mentre cucinava, né nel suo desiderio che la gente assaporasse il suo cibo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A Shannon non piaceva la malizia che a volte Gouda faceva trasparire, ma sapeva che non fingeva quando sorrideva in modo bambinesco mentre cucinava, né quando esprimeva il desiderio che le sue ricette venissero apprezzate da tutti.
Turkish (TR): Shannon, Gohda'nın ara sıra yaptığı sahtekârlıklardan hoşlanmasa da, yemek pişirirken yüzünde beliren çocuksu gülümsemede, ya da insanların yemeklerinden keyif almasını istemesinde bir sahtekârlık olmadığını biliyordu.

Steam (ST): So even though it was a little aggravating to be made to wash the dishes, she couldn't really hate him.
Umineko Project (UP): So even though it was a little aggravating to be made to wash the dishes, she couldn't really hate him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So even though it was a little aggravating to be made to wash the dishes, she couldn't really hate him.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、こうして皿を洗わせられるのはちょっぴり腹立たしかったけど、何となく憎めないと思うのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから、こうして皿を洗わせられるのはちょっぴり腹立たしかったけど、何となく憎めないと思うのだった。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, хотя и было немного обременительно мыть посуду, она действительно не могла ненавидеть его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, mesmo que isso tenha sido um pouco agravado por tê‐la feito lavar os pratos, ela não podia realmente odiá‐lo.
Vietnamese (VI): So even though it was a little aggravating to be made to wash the dishes, she couldn't really hate him.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，紗音縱然對讓自己洗盤子這事稍稍有點來氣，卻也總覺得對他討厭不起來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，纱音纵然对让自己洗盘子这事稍稍有点来气，却也总觉得对他讨厌不起来。
Indonesian (IDN): So even though it was a little aggravating to be made to wash the dishes, she couldn't really hate him.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò, anche se era un po' seccante essere messa a lavare i piatti, non riusciva a odiarlo davvero.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Perciò, anche se trovava un po' seccante essere messa a lavare i piatti, non riusciva a odiarlo davvero.
Turkish (TR): Bulaşıkları yıkamak zorunda bırakılması biraz sinir bozucu olsa da, ondan gerçekten nefret etmiyordu.

Steam (ST): However, they couldn't have dreamed that Rosa was calling them wolves in the parlor at exactly the same moment they were spending their time peacefully like this...
Umineko Project (UP): However, they couldn't have dreamed that Rosa was calling them wolves in the parlor at exactly the same moment that they were spending their time peacefully like this......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, they couldn't have dreamed that Rosa was calling them wolves in the parlor at exactly the same moment that they were spending their time peacefully like this......
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、彼らがこうして和やかに過ごすのとまさか同じ頃、楼座が客間で、使用人たちを狼呼ばわりしているなど、夢にも思うまい……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、彼らがこうして和やかに過ごすのとまさか同じ頃、楼座が客間で、使用人たちを狼呼ばわりしているなど、夢にも思うまい……。
Russian (RU): Однако им и присниться не могло, что Роза назовёт их волками в гостиной в тот самый момент, когда они так мирно проводили своё время...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, eles nunca sonhariam que Rosa os chamaria de lobos no exato momento em que eles passavam seu tempo pacificamente assim......
Vietnamese (VI): However, they couldn't have dreamed that Rosa was calling them wolves in the parlor at exactly the same moment that they were spending their time peacefully like this......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，他們也是做夢也不會想到，就在他們和樂融融地安度時光的同時，樓座卻竟在客廳，把傭人們稱作了狼吧……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，他们也是做梦也不会想到，就在他们和乐融融地安度时光的同时，楼座却竟在客厅，把佣人们称作了狼吧……。
Indonesian (IDN): However, they couldn't have dreamed that Rosa was calling them wolves in the parlor at exactly the same moment that they were spending their time peacefully like this......
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, non avrebbero mai immaginato che Rosa, in quello stesso momento, in salotto, mentre loro stavano passando il tempo in quel modo pacifico, li stesse chiamando lupi...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, loro non avrebbero mai immaginato che, nello stesso momento in cui stavano passando il tempo in armonia, nel salotto erano stati definiti da Rosa come dei lupi...
Turkish (TR): Ancak, tam da böyle huzur dolu bir şekilde vakit geçirdikleri bir anda Rosa'nın salonda onları kurt ilan ettiğini hayal bile edemezlerdi......

Steam (ST): At that time, several of the servants heard a sound like something being dragged, and then a *thump*.
Umineko Project (UP): At that time, several of the servants heard a sound like something was being dragged, and then a thump.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At that time, several of the servants heard a sound like something was being dragged, and then a *thump*.
PC Japanese (JP): その時、何人かの使用人が、ずるる、どしゃり、という音を聞いた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その時、何人かの使用人が、ずるる、どしゃり、という音を聞いた。
Russian (RU): И тут некоторые из них услышали звук, словно кто‐то что‐то волок, а затем *удар*.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao mesmo tempo, alguns deles ouviram o som de algo sendo arrastado, e então uma batida.
Vietnamese (VI): At that time, several of the servants heard a sound like something was being dragged, and then a thump.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就在此時，有幾個傭人聽到了“呲溜呲溜，啪嚓”的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就在此时，有几个佣人听到了“呲溜呲溜，啪嚓”的声音。
Indonesian (IDN): At that time, several of the servants heard a sound like something was being dragged, and then a thump.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quel momento, diversi domestici sentirono un suono come di qualcosa che veniva trascinato, e poi un *thump*.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In quell'attimo, alcuni dei domestici sentirono un suono di qualcosa che veniva trascinato, seguito da un ‘thump’.
Turkish (TR): Bu sırada, hizmetkârlardan birkaçı bir şeyin sürüklenmesine benzer bir ses ve ardından da bir gümbürtü duydu.

Steam (ST): It seemed like the sound made by a servant outside the back door when they were carrying a mountain of trash bags on a rainy day, or maybe when a servant was returning from work wearing a raincoat.
Umineko Project (UP): When a servant was out carrying a mountain of trash bags on a rainy day, or doing some work in a raincoat, they would create exactly this kind of noise and presence as they returned and hovered around the back door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed like the sound made by a servant outside the back door when they were carrying a mountain of trash bags on a rainy day, or maybe when a servant was returning from work wearing a raincoat.
PC Japanese (JP): それは雨の日にゴミ袋の山を運んだり、あるいは雨合羽で作業をして帰ってきた使用人などが、勝手口の辺りにいる時に立てる音や気配そのものだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それは雨の日にゴミ袋の山を運んだり、あるいは雨合羽で作業をして帰ってきた使用人などが、勝手口の辺りにいる時に立てる音や気配そのものだった。
Russian (RU): Такой звук мог издавать находящий снаружи за задней дверью слуга, выносящий мешки с мусором в дождливый день, или, возможно, слуга, возвращающийся с работы в плаще‐дождевике.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando os serviçais estão carregando uma montanha de lixo em um dia de chuva, ou fazendo algum trabalho com a capa de chuva, eles produzem exatamente esse tipo de ruído e a presença de quem retornava e pairava pela porta dos fundos.
Vietnamese (VI): When a servant was out carrying a mountain of trash bags on a rainy day, or doing some work in a raincoat, they would create exactly this kind of noise and presence as they returned and hovered around the back door.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這正是在雨天搬運成堆的垃圾袋，又或者是穿著雨衣做完工作回來的傭人，在後門附近時自然會發出的聲響。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这正是在雨天搬运成堆的垃圾袋，又或者是穿着雨衣做完工作回来的佣人，在后门附近时自然会发出的声响。
Indonesian (IDN): When a servant was out carrying a mountain of trash bags on a rainy day, or doing some work in a raincoat, they would create exactly this kind of noise and presence as they returned and hovered around the back door.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava il suono fatto da un domestico fuori dalla porta sul retro mentre portava tanti sacchi dell'immondizia in un giorno di pioggia, o magari mentre stava tornando dal lavoro con addosso un impermeabile.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando un domestico portava una pila di sacchi dell'immondizia durante un giorno piovoso, o magari tornava da una mansione con un impermeabile addosso, emetteva quel tipo di suono nelle volte in cui era nei pressi della porta di servizio.
Turkish (TR): Yağmurlu bir günde bir hizmetkâr dışarı çıkıp bir yığın çöp torbası taşıdığında ya da yağmurluğuyla bir iş yaptığında, arka kapının etrafında dolaşıp dururken tam da bu tür bir gürültü yaratırdı.

Steam (ST): So at first, that sound didn't seem like anything out of the ordinary to any of them...
Umineko Project (UP): So after hearing that sound, at first, none of them noticed anything out of the ordinary...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So after hearing that sound, at first, none of them noticed anything out of the ordinary...
PC Japanese (JP): だからその音を聞いて、特別に違和感を感じる者は最初、いなかった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だからその音を聞いて、特別に違和感を感じる者は最初、いなかった…。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, услыхав данный звук, никто сперва не нашёл в нём ничего необычного...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, após ouvir aquele som, primeiramente, nenhum deles notou nada fora do comum...
Vietnamese (VI): So after hearing that sound, at first, none of them noticed anything out of the ordinary...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以在剛聽到這聲音時，並沒有人感覺到什麼特別不對勁的地方…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以在刚听到这声音时，并没有人感觉到什么特别不对劲的地方…。
Indonesian (IDN): So after hearing that sound, at first, none of them noticed anything out of the ordinary...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò dopo averlo sentito, inizialmente, nessuno di loro notò nulla fuori dall'ordinario...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Perciò, inizialmente nessuno di loro notò nulla al di fuori dell'ordinario quando lo udirono...
Turkish (TR): Yani ilk etapta bu sesi duyduktan sonra hiçbiri sıra dışı bir şey fark etmemişti...

Steam (ST): But they soon realized. ......Right now, everyone was either in the kitchen or in the parlor, so who could possibly be at the back door...?!
Umineko Project (UP): But they quickly realized. ............In a situation where everyone was either in the kitchen or the parlor, who in the world was at the back door...?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But they quickly realized.............In a situation where everyone was either in the kitchen or the parlor, who in the world was at the back door...?!
PC Japanese (JP): しかしすぐに気付く。…………客間と厨房に全ての人間がいるこの状況下で、一体、誰が勝手口に…？！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかしすぐに気付く。…………客間と厨房に全ての人間がいるこの状況下で、一体、誰が勝手口に…？！
Russian (RU): Но затем они быстро осознали. ............В ситуации, когда все находились на кухне или гостиной, кто ещё мог находиться за задней дверью?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas rapidamente eles perceberam. ............Em uma situação onde todos estavam na cozinha ou na sala de visitas, quem diabos poderia estar na porta dos fundos...?!
Vietnamese (VI): But they quickly realized. ............In a situation where everyone was either in the kitchen or the parlor, who in the world was at the back door...?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但他們馬上就察覺到了。…………在這所有人都身在客廳與廚房中的情況下，究竟是什麼人，會出現在後門…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但他们马上就察觉到了。…………在这所有人都身在客厅与厨房中的情况下，究竟是什么人，会出现在后门…？！
Indonesian (IDN): But they quickly realized. ............In a situation where everyone was either in the kitchen or the parlor, who in the world was at the back door...?!
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma se ne accorsero presto. ... In una situazione in cui tutti quanti erano radunati o nella cucina o nel salotto, chi diavolo poteva essere alla porta sul retro...?!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma se ne resero conto presto... Se tutti quanti erano o in cucina o in salotto, chi diavolo poteva esserci davanti alla porta di servizio...?!
Turkish (TR): Fakat kısa sürede fark ettiler. ............Herkesin ya mutfakta ya da salonda olduğu bir sırada, arka kapıda biri nasıl olabilirdi...?!

Steam (ST): As the servants all looked at each other, they checked to make sure that each one of them knew what that sound meant.
Umineko Project (UP): As the servants all looked at each other, they checked to make sure that each one of them knew what that sound meant.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the servants all looked at each other, they checked to make sure that each one of them knew what that sound meant.
PC Japanese (JP): 使用人たちは互いの顔を見合いながら、その音の意味するところを互いが理解しているかを確認し合う。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 使用人たちは互いの顔を見合いながら、その音の意味するところを互いが理解しているかを確認し合う。
Russian (RU): Переглянувшись друг с другом, слуги поняли, что каждому известно, что означает этот звук.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos os serviçais se entreolharam, conferindo se cada um deles sabia o que aquele barulho significava.
Vietnamese (VI): As the servants all looked at each other, they checked to make sure that each one of them knew what that sound meant.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 傭人們面面相覷，互相確認著對方是否理解了這聲音意味著什麼。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Guardandosi l'un l'altro, i domestici si assicurarono che ciascuno di loro sapesse cosa implicava quel rumore.

Steam (ST): The servants knew the mansion's layout well.
Umineko Project (UP): The servants knew the mansion's layout well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The servants knew the mansion's layout well.

Vietnamese (VI): The servants knew the mansion's layout well.
