Turkish (TR): Hizmetkârlar malikanenin planını iyi biliyorlardı.

Steam (ST): So they understood how incomprehensible it would be for someone from the parlor to actually go outside in this typhoon, go all the way around, and come up to this back door.
Umineko Project (UP): So they understood how unimaginable it would be for someone from the parlor to actually go outside in this typhoon, go all the way around, and come up to this back door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So they understood how incomprehensible it would be for someone from the parlor to actually go outside in this typhoon, go all the way around, and come up to this back door.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、客間の誰かが、わざわざこの台風の中を表に出て、ぐるりと回って勝手口までやって来ることが考えられないことを理解していた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから、客間の誰かが、わざわざこの台風の中を表に出て、ぐるりと回って勝手口までやって来ることが考えられないことを理解していた。
Russian (RU): Поэтому они понимали, насколько немыслимо было бы для кого‐нибудь выйти наружу в такую непогоду, пройти весь этот путь, и выйти к задней двери.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então eles entendiam o quão inimaginável era alguém que estava na sala de visitas realmente ir para fora, em meio a esse tufão, fazer toda a volta, e então entrar pela porta dos fundos.
Vietnamese (VI): So they understood how unimaginable it would be for someone from the parlor to actually go outside in this typhoon, go all the way around, and come up to this back door.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以他們清楚，這很難想像會是客廳中的某人，特地跑到在刮台風的戶外，還兜了一個大圈來到後門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以他们清楚，这很难想象会是客厅中的某人，特地跑到在刮台风的户外，还兜了一个大圈来到后门。
Indonesian (IDN): So they understood how unimaginable it would be for someone from the parlor to actually go outside in this typhoon, go all the way around, and come up to this back door.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi capivano quanto fosse incomprensibile per qualcuno uscire dal salotto in questa tempesta, fare il giro, e arrivare a questa porta di servizio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Perciò comprendevano quanto fosse irrazionale per qualcuno nel salotto prendersi il fastidio di uscire durante un tifone, e farsi poi un giro completo per arrivare alla porta di servizio.
Turkish (TR): Dolayısıyla, salondan birinin bu tayfunda dışarı çıkmasının, tüm yolu dolaşmasının, ve bu arka kapıya kadar gelmesinin ne kadar olanaksız olduğunu anladılar.

Steam (ST): Then was it Kinzo? ...They couldn't imagine that Kinzo, who never left his study, would dash out into the middle of this typhoon and come to the back of the house, where only low-class people ever entered or exited.
Umineko Project (UP): Then was it Kinzo? ...They found it even more difficult to imagine that Kinzo, who never left his study even under normal conditions, would dash out into the middle of this typhoon for no apparent reason, and come to the back of the house, where only low‐class people came in or out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then was it Kinzo? ...They couldn't imagine that Kinzo, who never left his study, would dash out into the middle of this typhoon and come to the back of the house, where only low class people came in or out.
PC Japanese (JP): ならば金蔵が？　…普段だって書斎から出てこない金蔵が、何を思ったか台風の中に飛び出して、下々の者しか出入りしないような裏手にやって来るなんて、なお考えられなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ならば金蔵が？　…普段だって書斎から出てこない金蔵が、何を思ったか台風の中に飛び出して、下々の者しか出入りしないような裏手にやって来るなんて、なお考えられなかった。
Russian (RU): Тогда был ли это Кинзо? ...Они не могли себе представить, чтобы Кинзо, никогда не покидавший свой кабинет, выбежал прямо под этот тайфун и прибежал к задней части дома, где находился вход для людей низкого класса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seria Kinzo? ...Era ainda mais difícil imaginar que Kinzo, que nunca deixava seu estúdio, mesmo em condições normais, correria em meio ao tufão, sem um motivo aparente, e então retornaria à casa, por onde apenas as pessoas de baixa classe entravam e saiam.
Vietnamese (VI): Then was it Kinzo? ...They found it even more difficult to imagine that Kinzo, who never left his study even under normal conditions, would dash out into the middle of this typhoon for no apparent reason, and come to the back of the house, where only low‐class people came in or out.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這麼說來，是金藏？…就連平時都待在書房裡不出來的金藏，不知想著什麼飛奔進台風之中，來到只有下人們才會出入的大屋後側，就更是難以想像了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这么说来，是金藏？…就连平时都待在书房里不出来的金藏，不知想着什么飞奔进台风之中，来到只有下人们才会出入的大屋后侧，就更是难以想象了。
Indonesian (IDN): Then was it Kinzo? ...They found it even more difficult to imagine that Kinzo, who never left his study even under normal conditions, would dash out into the middle of this typhoon for no apparent reason, and come to the back of the house, where only low‐class people came in or out.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Allora era Kinzo? ... Non riuscivano a immaginare che Kinzo, che non lasciava mai il suo studio, potesse correre in mezzo al tifone e arrivare sul retro della casa, da dove entravano o uscivano soltanto persone di basso rango.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Allora era Kinzo...? Trovavano ancor più difficile da concepire che a Kinzo, uno che solitamente non lasciava mai il suo studio, fosse venuto in mente di gettarsi in mezzo al tifone e di giungere fino al retro dell'edificio, da dove entrava e usciva solamente gente di basso rango.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo muydu? ...Normal şartlar altında bile çalışma odasından çıkmayan Kinzo'nun, ortada hiçbir neden yokken bu tayfunun ortasına dalıp, sadece düşük rütbeli kişilerin girip çıktığı evin arka tarafına gelmesini hayal etmek onlara daha da zor geliyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): "......Tha‐......that wasn't...our imagination, was it......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Th, ......that wasn't, our imagination, was it......?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Is‐......isso não foi...nossa imaginação, foi......?"
Vietnamese (VI): "......Tha‐......that wasn't...our imagination, was it......?"

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro

PC Japanese (JP): 「弾は、４〜５発じゃありませんか。ということは、私たち全員を殺すには足りないということです…。うかつに刺激しなければ、きっと楼座さまも無闇には…、」

Russian (RU): "Там четыре или пять патронов, не так ли? Это значит, их не хватит, чтобы убить нас всех... Если мы неосторожно спровоцируем её, то даже Роза‐сама может поступить необдуманно..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Tem quatro ou cinco cartuchos, certo? Isso significa que não tem o bastante para matar a todos nós... Se não a provocarmos de forma descuidada, tenho certeza que a Rosa‐sama não vai agir imprudentemente—"
Vietnamese (VI): "There are four or five cartridges, are there not? That means there aren't enough to kill all of us... If we don't carelessly provoke her, surely even Rosa‐sama wouldn't recklessly—"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「子彈不也就是四五發嘛。照這麼說，那就是不夠把我們所有人殺光的…。只要不去隨隨便便刺激她，樓座夫人也一定不會亂來…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「子弹不也就是四五发嘛。照这么说，那就是不够把我们所有人杀光的…。只要不去随随便便刺激她，楼座夫人也一定不会乱来…」
Indonesian (IDN): "There are four or five cartridges, are there not? That means there aren't enough to kill all of us... If we don't carelessly provoke her, surely even Rosa‐sama wouldn't recklessly—"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ci sono quattro o cinque cartucce, giusto? Il che significa che non ce ne sono abbastanza per ucciderci tutti... se non la provochiamo scioccamente, sicuramente anche Rosa-sama sarà ragionevole..."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ci sono dai quattro ai cinque proiettili, giusto? Vuol dire che non ce ne sono abbastanza per ucciderci tutti... Se non la istigheremo inutilmente, sicuramente anche la signora Rosa non sarà così irragionevole da—"
Turkish (TR): "Dört ya da beş mermi var, değil mi? Demek ki hepimizi öldürmeye yetecek kadar yok... Eğer onu dikkatsizce kışkırtmazsak, eminim Rosa-sama bile pervasızca—"

Speaker: Kanon

Umineko Project (UP): "............No, she said it. She said she'll massacre all of us."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............No, she said it. She said she'll massacre all of us."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………うぅん、あいつは言ったよ。僕たちを皆殺しにすると言った」
Russian (RU): "............Нет, она сказала это. Она сказала, что прикончит нас всех."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Não, ela disse isso. Ela disse que vai massacrar a todos nós."
Vietnamese (VI): "............No, she said it. She said she'll massacre all of us."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………不，那家伙说了。她说了要把我们全杀光。」

Steam (ST): Kanon, who they'd thought was sleeping quietly, suddenly started talking brightly.
Umineko Project (UP): Kanon, who they thought had been sleeping quietly, suddenly started talking brightly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kanon, who they thought had been sleeping quietly, suddenly started talking brightly.
PC Japanese (JP): それまで、静かに眠っていると思っていた嘉音が、急に朗々と喋る。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それまで、静かに眠っていると思っていた嘉音が、急に朗々と喋る。
Russian (RU): Канон, который, как они думали спокойно спал, вдруг чётко заговорил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kanon, que eles pensavam que estava dormindo silenciosamente, de repente começou a falar de forma vívida.
Vietnamese (VI): Kanon, who they thought had been sleeping quietly, suddenly started talking brightly.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此前，大家都認為是在安靜沉睡的嘉音，突然聲音洪亮地說起了話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此前，大家都认为是在安静沉睡的嘉音，突然声音洪亮地说起了话。
Indonesian (IDN): Kanon, who they thought had been sleeping quietly, suddenly started talking brightly.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kanon, che pensavano stesse dormendo tranquillamente, improvvisamente cominciò a parlare brillantemente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Kanon, che fino ad allora credevano stesse dormendo in silenzio, tutt'a un tratto parlò con voce chiara.
Turkish (TR): Sessizce uyuduğunu düşündükleri Kanon aniden canlı bir şekilde konuşmaya başladı.

Steam (ST): Almost as though he'd been awake this whole time and had suddenly opened his mouth.
Umineko Project (UP): Almost like he had been awake the whole time and had suddenly opened his mouth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Almost like he had been awake the whole time and had suddenly opened his mouth.
PC Japanese (JP): まるでさっきからずっと起きていて、急に口を開いたかのようだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): まるでさっきからずっと起きていて、急に口を開いたかのようだった。
Russian (RU): Как будто он и не спал всё это время и неожиданно открыл рот.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quase como se ele estivesse acordado o tempo todo e de repente abriu a boca.
Vietnamese (VI): Almost like he had been awake the whole time and had suddenly opened his mouth.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 簡直就像他從剛才開始就一直醒著，冷不丁地張開了口一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 简直就像他从刚才开始就一直醒着，冷不丁地张开了口一样。
Indonesian (IDN): Almost like he had been awake the whole time and had suddenly opened his mouth.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come se fosse stato sveglio tutto il tempo e avesse aperto improvvisamente bocca.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Come se fosse rimasto sveglio tutto il tempo e avesse improvvisamente preso parola.
Turkish (TR): Sanki bunca zamandır uyanıkmış da aniden ağzını açmış gibiydi.

Steam (ST): Kanon looked firm and steady, which relieved Nanjo a bit, but considering the depth of that wound, he couldn't wipe away a certain creepy feeling.
Umineko Project (UP): He looked firm and steady, and Nanjo was slightly relieved, but thinking of the deepness of that wound, he just couldn't wipe away a certain creepy feeling.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He looked firm and steady, and Nanjo was slightly relieved, but thinking of the deepness of that wound, he just couldn't wipe away a certain creepy feeling.
PC Japanese (JP): その様子がしっかりしていたので、南條は少しだけほっとするが、傷の深さを考えると、どうしてもある不気味さが拭えなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その様子がしっかりしていたので、南條は少しだけほっとするが、傷の深さを考えると、どうしてもある不気味さが拭えなかった。
Russian (RU): Он выглядел спокойным и решительным, и Нанджо немного успокоился, но вспоминая о глубине его раны, он не мог избавиться от жуткого предчувствия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele parecia firme e estável, e Nanjo suspirou aliviado, mas pensando na profundidade da ferida, ele não conseguia eliminar um certo sentimento assustador.
Vietnamese (VI): He looked firm and steady, and Nanjo was slightly relieved, but thinking of the deepness of that wound, he just couldn't wipe away a certain creepy feeling.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於他這副樣子很是精神，因而南條稍稍鬆了口氣，但一想到他的傷口之深，便怎麼也無法拭去某種讓人內心發毛的感覺了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 由于他这副样子很是精神，因而南条稍稍松了口气，但一想到他的伤口之深，便怎么也无法拭去某种让人内心发毛的感觉了。
Indonesian (IDN): He looked firm and steady, and Nanjo was slightly relieved, but thinking of the deepness of that wound, he just couldn't wipe away a certain creepy feeling.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava deciso e pronto, e Nanjo ne fu leggermente rassicurato, ma pensando alla profondità di quella ferita, non riusciva a togliersi di dosso un terribile presentimento.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Nanjo fu leggermente rassicurato dai sui modi decisi, ma ripensando alla profondità della sua ferita, per quanto voleva non riuscì a scacciare un presentimento...
Turkish (TR): Sağlam ve soğukkanlı göründüğünden Nanjo biraz rahatlamıştı ama yaranın derinliğini düşününce içinde oluşan ürpertiyi bir türlü silemiyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ......He knew because he was a doctor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......He knew because he was a doctor.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……彼は医者だからわかる。

Vietnamese (VI): ......He knew because he was a doctor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……他是醫生，所以清楚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……他是医生，所以清楚。
Indonesian (IDN): ......He knew because he was a doctor.

Turkish (TR): ......O biliyordu çünkü o bir doktordu.

Steam (ST): After losing so much blood, Kanon might easily have lost consciousness. And yet, somehow, he was still intensely aware of his surroundings.
Umineko Project (UP): Kanon should have been expected to fall unconscious after losing so much blood.{n}And yet somehow, he had preserved his awareness so clearly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It wouldn't have been unexpected if Kanon had lost consciousness after losing so much blood. And yet somehow, he had preserved his awareness so clearly.
PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音の出血量なら意識を失って当然だ。なのにこんなにもはっきりとした意識を保てるなんて。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 嘉音の出血量なら意識を失って当然だ。{n}なのにこんなにもはっきりとした意識を保てるなんて。
Russian (RU): Это не стало бы неожиданностью, потеряй Канон‐кун сознание от такой большой кровопотери.{n}И тем не менее ему удавалось сохранять ясность сознания.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era esperado que Kanon ficasse inconsciente depois de perder tanto sangue.{n}E mesmo assim, de alguma forma, ele havia preservado sua consciência tão claramente.
Vietnamese (VI): Kanon should have been expected to fall unconscious after losing so much blood.{n}And yet somehow, he had preserved his awareness so clearly.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 按嘉音的出血量，理當失去意識。{n}可儘管如此，他卻竟還如此清晰明了地保有著意識。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 按嘉音的出血量，理当失去意识。{n}可尽管如此，他却竟还如此清晰明了地保有着意识。
Indonesian (IDN): Kanon should have been expected to fall unconscious after losing so much blood.{n}And yet somehow, he had preserved his awareness so clearly.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non sarebbe stato inaspettato se Kanon avesse perso conoscenza dopo aver perso così tanto sangue. E ancora tuttavia in qualche modo, aveva mantenuto una chiara consapevolezza.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Con tutto il sangue che gli era fuoriuscito, sarebbe stato normale se Kanon avesse perso conoscenza.{n}Ma, nonostante tutto, era rimasto chiaramente cosciente.
Turkish (TR): Kanon'un o kadar kan kaybettikten sonra bilincini kaybetmesi gerekirdi.{n}Ama yine de bir şekilde, farkındalığını çok net bir şekilde korumuştu.

Steam (ST): ...Was it youth? Or was it tenacity? ...Sometimes, the power of human life surpassed common knowledge...
Umineko Project (UP): ......Youth? Or tenacity?{n}...Sometimes the power of human life did surpass common knowledge......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Was it youth? Or was it tenacity?...Sometimes, the power of human life surpassed common knowledge......
PC Japanese (JP): ……若さ？　それとも執念？…時に人の生命力は常識を超えることもあるし……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……若さ？　それとも執念？{n}…時に人の生命力は常識を超えることもあるし……。
Russian (RU): ......Было ли это благодаря его молодости? Или же упорству?{n}...Иногда сила человеческой жизни превосходит научные познания...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Juventude? Ou tenacidade?{n}...Algumas vezes o poder da vida humana ultrapassa o senso comum......
Vietnamese (VI): ......Youth? Or tenacity?{n}...Sometimes the power of human life did surpass common knowledge......

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): ...Era la giovinezza? O era la tenacia...?{n}A volte, la forza vitale della persone era capace di superare il senso comune...

Steam (ST): While stopping the bleeding, Nanjo had groped around a bit inside the bleeding hole with tweezers, making sure there were no foreign objects inside the affected area, and the great depth of the wound had shocked him.
Umineko Project (UP): When they had stopped the bleeding, to make sure there were no foreign objects inside the affected area, Nanjo had groped around a bit inside the bleeding hole with tweezers, and the great depth of the wound had surprised him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When they had stopped the bleeding, Nanjo had groped around a bit inside the bleeding hole with tweezers, to make sure there were no foreign objects inside the affected area, and the great depth of the wound had surprised him.
PC Japanese (JP): 止血の時、患部に何か異物があってはいけないと、血の湧き出す穴をピンセットで少しだけまさぐったが、そのあまりの深さに驚いた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 止血の時、患部に何か異物があってはいけないと、血の湧き出す穴をピンセットで少しだけまさぐったが、そのあまりの深さに驚いた。
Russian (RU): Когда они остановили кровотечение, Нанджо немного поискал внутри кровоточащего отверстия с помощью пинцета, чтобы убедиться, что внутри пораженной зоны нет никаких посторонних элементов, и большая глубина раны потрясла его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eles pararam o sangramento, fizeram questão de confirmar que não havia nenhum objeto na área afetada, Nanjo tateou com uma pinça dentro do buraco repleto de sangue e a grande profundidade da ferida o surpreendeu.
Vietnamese (VI): When they had stopped the bleeding, to make sure there were no foreign objects inside the affected area, Nanjo had groped around a bit inside the bleeding hole with tweezers, and the great depth of the wound had surprised him.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在為嘉音止血時，為了不讓傷口裡留有異物，南條曾用鑷子伸進涌出鮮血的洞裡稍微試探過一下，但那深度著實是嚇了他一跳。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在为嘉音止血时，为了不让伤口里留有异物，南条曾用镊子伸进涌出鲜血的洞里稍微试探过一下，但那深度着实是吓了他一跳。
Indonesian (IDN): When they had stopped the bleeding, to make sure there were no foreign objects inside the affected area, Nanjo had groped around a bit inside the bleeding hole with tweezers, and the great depth of the wound had surprised him.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando avevano fermato l'emorragia, Nanjo aveva tastato con delle pinzette l'interno di quel buco sanguinante, per essere sicuro che non ci fossero corpi estranei nell'area colpita, e la grande profondità della ferita lo aveva sorpreso.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando fermò l'emorragia, aveva leggermente armeggiato nel foro sanguinante con delle pinzette, per assicursarsi che nell'area interessata non ci fossero corpi estranei, ed era rimasto sorpreso dalla sua grande profondità.
Turkish (TR): Kanamayı durdurduklarında, etkilenen bölgenin içinde yabancı bir cisim olmadığından emin olmak için, Nanjo cımbızla kanayan deliğin içini biraz yoklamış ve yaranın büyük derinliği onu şaşırtmıştı.

Steam (ST): ...But Kanon had spoken clearly. ...He'd hatefully stated that the one named Rosa made this wound, cursing and raging, over and over and over.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma Kanon si era espresso con chiarezza...{n}Aveva detto con odio che era stata Rosa la persona che gli aveva procurato quella ferita, e stava ripetutamente proferendo maledizioni e parole di rabbia.
Turkish (TR): ......Ama Kanon açıkça konuşmuştu.{n}...Nefretle bu yarayı Rosa adındaki kişinin açtığını söylüyor, küfürler ve öfkeli sözler tekrarlıyordu.

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "...She wants to kill everyone by any means necessary before the typhoon passes, so that she can have the Master's wealth all to herself. She told me that clearly."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kanon jumped like a wild goat, ...fleeing from the thing Shannon was holding.

Umineko Project (UP): And his arm drew trails with some kind of afterglow that flashed purple.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, from his arm, some kind of afterglow flashed purple and drew a locus.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、その腕が紫に閃く何かの残光で軌跡を描いた。
Russian (RU): Тут же из его руки мелькнул фиолетовый свет, нарисовавший локус.

Vietnamese (VI): And his arm drew trails with some kind of afterglow that flashed purple.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，他的手臂用某种闪着紫光的余辉，划下了几道轨迹。
Indonesian (IDN): And his arm drew trails with some kind of afterglow that flashed purple.

Steam (ST): That arc, which drew three beautiful purple curves, traced across the throats of Nanjo and Kumasawa, who had been tending to him.
Umineko Project (UP): They were three beautiful purple trails drawn in an arc, and they were traced across the throats of Nanjo and Kumasawa, who had been tending to him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That arc, which drew three beautiful purple loci, traced across the throats of Nanjo and Kumasawa, who had been tending to him.
PC Japanese (JP): それは弧を描く３つの美しい紫の軌跡で、彼を看護していた南條と熊沢の喉をなぞっていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それは弧を描く３つの美しい紫の軌跡で、彼を看護していた南條と熊沢の喉をなぞっていた。
Russian (RU): Дуга, прочертившая три красивых фиолетовых локуса, прошла по горлу Нанджо и Кумасавы, находившихся перед ним.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eram três lindas trilhas púrpuras que desenhavam um arco, que foram traçadas através das gargantas de Nanjo e Kumasawa, que estavam cuidando dele.
Vietnamese (VI): They were three beautiful purple trails drawn in an arc, and they were traced across the throats of Nanjo and Kumasawa, who had been tending to him.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是三道划成了弧形的，漂亮的紫色軌跡。而其中的兩道，分別劃過了在看護他的南條與熊澤的咽喉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是三道划成了弧形的，漂亮的紫色轨迹。而其中的两道，分别划过了在看护他的南条与熊泽的咽喉。
Indonesian (IDN): They were three beautiful purple trails drawn in an arc, and they were traced across the throats of Nanjo and Kumasawa, who had been tending to him.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Degli archi formati da tre meravigliose scie violette solcarono le gole di Nanjo e Kumasawa, le persone che si stavano prendendo cura di lui.
Turkish (TR): Bunlar yay şeklinde çizilmiş üç güzel mor izlerdi ve ona bakan Nanjo ve Kumasawa'nın boğazlarından geçiyorlardı.

Steam (ST): And, in an instant, Nanjo's and Kumasawa's throats...opened like gaping mouths, ...and then the blood really started spewing out.
Umineko Project (UP): And Nanjo and Kumasawa's throats......had opened like gaping mouths, ...and it was the very instant before the blood was about to start spewing out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And, in an instant, Nanjo and Kumasawa's throats, ......opened like gaping mouths, ...and from then on, the blood really started spewing out.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、南條と熊沢の喉が、……ぱっくりと口を開き、…血がこれからまさに噴出そうという刹那の時間。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、南條と熊沢の喉が、……ぱっくりと口を開き、…血がこれからまさに噴出そうという刹那の時間。
Russian (RU): И в один миг на горле Нанджо и Кумасавы... открылись, словно на них был рот... И оттуда тут же фонтаном полилась кровь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E as gargantas de Nanjo e Kumasawa......se abriram como bocas abertas, ...e um instante depois, o sangue começou a jorrar.
Vietnamese (VI): And Nanjo and Kumasawa's throats......had opened like gaping mouths, ...and it was the very instant before the blood was about to start spewing out.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，南条与熊泽的咽喉，……裂开了一道口子，…就在这血即将喷出的片刻之间。
Indonesian (IDN): And Nanjo and Kumasawa's throats......had opened like gaping mouths, ...and it was the very instant before the blood was about to start spewing out.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E, in un istante, le loro gole... si aprirono come bocche spalancate... e da quel momento, il sangue cominciò veramente ad essere vomitato fuori.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E in una frazione di secondo, le loro gole... si aprirono come delle bocche spalancate... e il sangue era sul punto di schizzar fuori.
Turkish (TR): Nanjo ve Kumasawa'nın boğazları......kocaman bir ağız gibi açılmıştı, ...ve bu tam da kan fışkırmaya başlamadan önceki andı.

Steam (ST): Because Genji, who had been behind her, had wrapped his own arm around Shannon's neck and pulled her back.
Umineko Project (UP): Because Genji, who had been behind her, had wrapped his own arm around Shannon's neck and pulled her back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because Genji, who had been behind her, had wrapped his own arm around Shannon's neck and pulled her back.

Steam (ST): In the instant it took Gohda to think fast in an attempt to understand this scene, the frozen moment in time shattered.
Umineko Project (UP): In the instant Gohda tried to think fast in an attempt to understand this scene, the frozen moment in time shattered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In the instant Gohda tried to think fast in an attempt to understand this scene, the frozen moment in time shattered.

Russian (RU): В то мгновение, что Года пытался быстро осознать разыгравшуюся перед ним сцену, момент, в течение которого время застыло, раскололся.

Turkish (TR): Gohda bu sahneyi anlamak için hızlı düşünmeye çalıştığı anda, donmuş haldeki zaman dilimi paramparça oldu.

Steam (ST): Blood was gushing from Nanjo and Kumasawa's torn-open necks.
Umineko Project (UP): Blood spewed forcefully from Nanjo and Kumasawa's necks, which had been torn open.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Blood was spewing forcefully from Nanjo and Kumasawa's necks, which had been torn open.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 南條と熊沢の切り裂かれた首から、威勢よく血が噴出す。
Russian (RU): Кровь с силой хлынула из шей Нанджо и Кумасавы, которые оказались вскрыты.

Vietnamese (VI): Blood spewed forcefully from Nanjo and Kumasawa's necks, which had been torn open.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 从南条与熊泽被切开的脖子中，鲜血喷溅而出。
Indonesian (IDN): Blood spewed forcefully from Nanjo and Kumasawa's necks, which had been torn open.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dai colli squarciati di Nanjo e Kumasawa, il sangue scorreva con furore.

Steam (ST): Kanon jumped and kicked off a picture frame that had been hanging from the wall behind him, springing forward just like a cat and aiming for Shannon's throat again.
Umineko Project (UP): Still mid‐jump, Kanon wall‐kicked off a picture frame that had been hanging from the wall behind him, springing forward just like a cat, and aiming for Shannon's throat again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kanon jumped and kicked off a picture frame that had been hanging from the wall behind him, springing forward just like a cat, and aiming for Shannon's throat again.
PC Japanese (JP): 飛んだ嘉音は後ろの壁に掛けられていた額縁を蹴り、紗音の喉元を再び狙って、まるで猫のように飛び掛る。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 飛んだ嘉音は後ろの壁に掛けられていた額縁を蹴り、紗音の喉元を再び狙って、まるで猫のように飛び掛る。
Russian (RU): Канон подскочил и, оттолкнувшись от картины, висевшей на стене позади него, подобно кошке бросился вперёд, и снова нацелился на горло Шаннон.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda em meio ao salto, Kanon chutou um quadro que estava pendurado na parede atrás dele, correndo para frente como um gato, e almejando pela garganta de Shannon mais uma vez.
Vietnamese (VI): Still mid‐jump, Kanon wall‐kicked off a picture frame that had been hanging from the wall behind him, springing forward just like a cat, and aiming for Shannon's throat again.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 飛在半空的嘉音用腳一蹬掛在身後牆壁上的畫框，再度瞄準紗音的咽喉，如同貓一般地飛撲了過去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 飞在半空的嘉音用脚一蹬挂在身后墙壁上的画框，再度瞄准纱音的咽喉，如同猫一般地飞扑了过去。
Indonesian (IDN): Still mid‐jump, Kanon wall‐kicked off a picture frame that had been hanging from the wall behind him, springing forward just like a cat, and aiming for Shannon's throat again.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kanon saltò e calciò una cornice che era appesa nella parete dietro di lui, balzando in avanti proprio come un gatto, e mirando di nuovo alla gola di Shannon.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mentre era a mezz'aria, Kanon calciò una cornice appesa alla parete dietro di lui, e balzando come un gatto, mirò nuovamente alla gola di Shannon.
Turkish (TR): Kanon hâlâ havada süzülürken arkasındaki duvarda asılı duran bir resim çerçevesine tekme atarak tıpkı bir kedi gibi ileri atıldı ve yeniden Shannon'un boğazını hedef aldı.

Steam (ST): But Kanon's target once again disappeared from in front of him. Because Genji had pulled Shannon again, and the two of them had fallen to the ground in a defensive crouch.
Umineko Project (UP): But Kanon's target once again disappeared from in front of him. Because Genji had pulled Shannon again, and the two of them had fallen onto the ground, keeping flat to the floor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But Kanon's target once again disappeared from in front of him. Because Genji had pulled Shannon again, and the two of them had fallen onto the ground as though hiding.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし再び獲物は嘉音の前から消えた。源次が再び紗音を引っ張り、二人で伏せるように床に転げたからだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし再び獲物は嘉音の前から消えた。源次が再び紗音を引っ張り、二人で伏せるように床に転げたからだ。
Russian (RU): Но цель Канона снова исчезла перед ним. Поскольку Генджи снова оттянул Шаннон, и они оба упали на пол, словно прячась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas seu alvo mais uma vez desapareceu em sua frente. Por que Genji havia puxado Shannon novamente, e ambos caíram no chão, mantendo‐se planos ao chão.

Steam (ST): Of course, the smell was the same too. As he was horribly burned, festering in filthy red and black and crying out in his death throes, Kanon's body burst open and scattered.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, the smell was the same too. As he was burned and inflamed, festering in filthy red and black, and cried out in his death throes, Kanon's body burst open and scattered.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん臭いもそっくりだった。焼けて爛れて、汚らしい赤と黒に爛れ落ち、断末魔の声と共に嘉音の体は爆ぜ散った。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, o cheiro também era o mesmo. Quando ele foi queimado e inflamado, enferrujado em um imundo vermelho e preto, ele gritou em agonia, e o corpo de Kanon abriu‐se e se espalhou.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然这气味也是一模一样。它被烧得溃烂，散落成了肮脏的红色与黑色，而伴随着临死前的惨叫，嘉音的身体爆散了开来。

Steam (ST): Those butterflies began to softly fade, as though into water...or rather, into the empty air itself, ...and afterwards, all that was left was the three survivors sitting on their butts, stained with blood.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「わ、私は大丈夫です…。しかし、………私たちは何を見たんだ！　何があったんです？！　わ、わたわた、……私はアレを、確かにこの手でこの壁に押し付けていたのに！」
Russian (RU): "Я... я в порядке... Но... что мы увидели?! Что произошло?! Д‐да‐да.... даже несмотря на то, что я несомненно прижал это к этой стене этой рукой!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E‐Eu estou bem... Mas.........o que foi que nós vimos?! O que aconteceu?!{n}A‐Ape‐Ap‐......Apesar disso, eu definitivamente empurrei aquela coisa contra a parede com essas mãos!"
Vietnamese (VI): "I, I am alright... But.........what did we see?! What happened?! E‐ev‐ev‐......even though I definitely pushed that thing against this wall with this very hand!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我、我沒事…。可是，………我們看到的是什麼啊！是發生了些什麼啊？！我、我我、……我明明都親手將那個東西摁在牆上了！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我、我没事…。可是，………我们看到的是什么啊！是发生了些什么啊？！我、我我、……我明明都亲手将那个东西摁在墙上了！」
Indonesian (IDN): "I, I am alright... But.........what did we see?! What happened?! E‐ev‐ev‐......even though I definitely pushed that thing against this wall with this very hand!"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "I-Io sto bene... ma... che cosa abbiamo visto?! Che cosa è successo?! {n}S-S... Sebbene io l'abbia di sicuro spinto contro questa parete con questa mia mano!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "I-Io sto bene... Ma... che cosa abbiamo visto?! Che cosa è successo...? S-S-S-So di aver spinto quella cosa contro il muro con le mie stesse mani, ma..."
Turkish (TR): "Ben, ben iyiyim... Ama.........biz ne gördük?! Ne oldu?! O-O-O-......O şeyi kesinlikle bu elimle bu duvara dayamama rağmen!"

Steam (ST): The bright-red blood left from his scuffle with Kanon...definitely remained.
Umineko Project (UP): The bright‐red blood left from his scuffle with Kanon...definitely remained.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The bright-red blood left from his scuffle with Kanon, definitely remained.
PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音と揉み合った際にその血で真っ赤に汚したのが、確かに残っている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 嘉音と揉み合った際にその血で真っ赤に汚したのが、確かに残っている。

Vietnamese (VI): The bright‐red blood left from his scuffle with Kanon...definitely remained.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A tutti gli effetti, su di lui era rimasto del sangue rosso intenso, che si era procurato durante la sua zuffa con Kanon.

Steam (ST): Shannon sobbed in front of Nanjo's and Kumasawa's remains... as Genji watched over her, silent as always...
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon sobbed in front of Nanjo's and Kumasawa's remains, ...and Genji watched over her, silent as always...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon sobbed in front of Nanjo's and Kumasawa's remains, ...as Genji watched over her, silent as always...
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は南條と熊沢の亡骸の前にしゃがみ込んで涙を流し、…源次はそれを見下ろしながら、変わらず無言でいるのだった…。

Vietnamese (VI): Shannon sobbed in front of Nanjo's and Kumasawa's remains, ...and Genji watched over her, silent as always...
